column1: Manager- Sales and Operations (Tourism and MICE)
column2: Job Title: Sales and Operations Manager (Tourism & MICE) Location:  CP, Delhi About Us:  House of Vacation is a prominent player in the tourism and MICE (Meetings, Incentives, Conferences, and Exhibitions) industry, dedicated to delivering exceptional experiences for our clients. We are seeking a dynamic Sales and Operations Manager to oversee and drive our sales efforts while ensuring seamless execution of events and services within the tourism and MICE sector. Role Overview:  As the Sales and Operations Manager, you will play a pivotal role in driving revenue growth and operational excellence within our organization. You will be responsible for leading a high-performing sales team, cultivating client relationships, managing event logistics, and optimizing operational efficiency to deliver exceptional experiences for our clients. Key Responsibilities: Sales: Develop      and implement sales strategies to drive revenue growth and achieve targets      within the tourism and MICE sector. Identify      and pursue new business opportunities, including lead generation,      prospecting, and networking within the industry. Build      and maintain strong relationships with clients, understanding their needs      and preferences to tailor solutions that meet and exceed expectations. Lead      the sales team in creating compelling proposals, presentations, and      pitches to win new business and secure repeat bookings. Monitor      sales performance, track key metrics, and provide regular reports and      insights to senior management to inform strategic decision-making. Operations: Oversee      the end-to-end operational management of events, conferences, and      exhibitions, ensuring seamless execution and delivery of services. Coordinate      with internal teams, external vendors, and partners to plan and execute      logistics, including venue selection, accommodation, transportation,      catering, AV production, and staffing. Manage      event budgets, negotiate contracts, and optimize resources to maximize      efficiency and profitability. Implement      quality control measures and risk management protocols to mitigate      potential issues and ensure a positive experience for clients and      attendees. Stay      abreast of industry trends, best practices, and regulatory requirements      related to event management and operations, and apply this knowledge to      continuously improve processes and services. Qualifications: Bachelor's      degree in Business Administration, Hospitality Management, or related      field. Proven      experience (X years) in sales and operations management, preferably within      the tourism, hospitality, or events industry. Strong      leadership skills with the ability to motivate and mentor a sales team to      achieve targets and exceed expectations. Excellent      communication and negotiation skills, with the ability to build rapport      and influence stakeholders at all levels. Exceptional      organizational and project management abilities, with a keen eye for      detail and a proactive approach to problem-solving. Proficiency      in relevant software and technology platforms, including CRM systems, event      management software, and Microsoft Office suite. Flexibility      to travel and work non-traditional hours as needed to support event      logistics and client requirements. Benefits: Competitive      salary and performance-based incentives. Opportunities      for professional development and career advancement. Collaborative      and supportive work environment with a focus on teamwork and innovation. Exciting      travel opportunities. How to Apply:  If you're a results-driven professional with a passion for sales and operations in the tourism and MICE industry, we'd love to hear from you! Please submit your resume and a cover letter outlining your relevant experience and why you're the ideal candidate for this role to WhatsApp no. 9717591372.

column2: Technical Sales support    :    Supports the local Sales organization/customers in determining the most technically appropriate and cost-effective solutions to meet their power quality requirements.      Provides technical support during the technical meeting and product presentations. Leads the technical discussion with customers, formulates technical solution w.r.t to power quality & harmonic analysis, recommends the best power quality solution post analysis and prepares technical proposal for the same.      Offers product/solution training.: Prepares and checks technical articles for publication.      Offer preparation    :    Prepares & supports preparation of technical proposals based on customers expectations in terms of power quality and organizational directives.      Participates in the kick off meeting organized by the project team, wherever required. Coordinates with Engineering team, Project management team, SCM, front tend team, end customers etc. and provide required support in each Project / Tender.      Taking ownership of the assigned work cost definition defines & estimates cost for the proposed solution and communicates to Sales organization, wherever required.      Living Hitachi Energy s core values of safety, quality and integrity, which means taking responsibility for your own actions while caring for your colleagues and the business.                Background            For this role we are looking for someone with a university degree in electrical engineering combined with a minimum of 8-10 years of experience in Power Quality & harmonic studies, knowledge on power systems.      Previous experience in Capacitors, value-based selling, technical solution sales will be preferred.      To be successful in this role you must be a self-starter, a continuous learner, having good communication skills, power quality and systems knowledge and hold a strong customer focus. Preferably, you have a proven track record of managing and facilitating change.          Proficiency in both spoken & written English language is required

column2: Support the Sales organization and customers throughout the proposal process in formulating technical solution for various power quality problems, preparing technical descriptions of the applied products and technology, support in determining costs, preparing final documentation, and serving as a key technical resource in the assigned area.               Your Responsibilities:           Technical Sales support   :    Supports the local Sales organization/customers in determining the most technically appropriate and cost-effective solutions to meet their power quality requirements.     Provides technical support during the technical meeting and product presentations. Leads the technical discussion with customers, formulates technical solution w.r.t to power quality & harmonic analysis, recommends the best power quality solution post analysis and prepares technical proposal for the same.     Offers product/solution training.: Prepares and checks technical articles for publication.     Offer preparation   :    Prepares & supports preparation of technical proposals based on customers expectations in terms of power quality and organizational directives.     Participates in the kick off meeting organized by the project team, wherever required. Coordinates with Engineering team, Project management team, SCM, front tend team, end customers etc. and provide required support in each Project / Tender.     Taking ownership of the assigned work cost definition defines & estimates cost for the proposed solution and communicates to Sales organization, wherever required.     Living Hitachi Energy s core values of safety, quality and integrity, which means taking responsibility for your own actions while caring for your colleagues and the business.               Background           For this role we are looking for someone with a university degree in electrical engineering combined with a minimum of 8-10 years of experience in Power Quality & harmonic studies, knowledge on power systems.     Previous experience in Capacitors, value-based selling, technical solution sales will be preferred.     To be successful in this role you must be a self-starter, a continuous learner, having good communication skills, power quality and systems knowledge and hold a strong customer focus. Preferably, you have a proven track record of managing and facilitating change.         Proficiency in both spoken & written English language is required

Intelligent Sales and Customer Operations provides an end-to-end, integrated, seamless solution across marketing, sales and service. column2: General Information:              Business Information:          The Hitachi Energy Indian Operations Center (INOPC) is a competence center with around 1500 skilled engineers who focus on tendering,  engineering,  planning,  procurement,  functional system testing,  installation supervision and commissioning.  However,  over the last decade,  it has evolved to become the largest engineering hub.  The India Operations Centre is a key aspect of the Power Grids business Power Up transformation program.  The Hitachi Energy Indian Operations Center team at Chennai supports Hitachi Energy s units in more than 40 countries across a wide portfolio of all the four business units in Power Grid business.  To date,  the team has executed engineering and commissioning for projects in more than 80 countries.               Mission Statement:            Responsible for administrating,  consulting and/or negotiating product/service contracts with external customers.  Develops pre-sales contract strategies and works closely with marketing,  sales,  and business management teams to structure         proposals/contracts/bid         documents.  Negotiates contracts that are consistent with business objectives and engages in contract amendments and renegotiation to accommodate scope changes.  Ensures fulfilment of contractual obligations from contracting parties.  Does not require the incumbent to have legal qualification An Entry Professional (P1) applies broad theoretical job knowledge typically obtained through advanced education.  May require the following proficiency: Work is closely supervised.  Problems faced are not typically difficult or complex.  Explains facts,  policies and practices related to job area.   .             Your Responsibilities:            Determine most technical appropriate and cost[1]effective solutions.         Collaborate across the Sales support team in offering solutions to country / region specific customers. Analyze customer needs through general market info and information provided by Service FES/Territory Managers. Supporting ASMs during Offers/Quotations for adequate follow-up and proper answers during the Offer clarification process.         Coordinating with multiple functions (Design,  Project management,  SCM etc) as part of tendering activity.         Cost analysis & Lost proposal analysis to obtain better future offering. column2: Role & responsibilities      UCAM is seeking a Deputy Manager - Sales who will collaborate closely with all Sales Engineers, establish a review process, and provide market data to the Sales Head.  The role involves being responsible for the complete sales cycle, from enquiry generation to order booking, nurturing and maintaining relationships with major customers, generating and developing leads, prospecting and securing business from new customers. The Deputy Manager is expected to create rapport, manage client expectations, report sales activities regularly, make presentations, attend techno-commercial discussions and negotiations, achieve sales goals on a monthly/quarterly/yearly basis, perform competitor analysis, and keep the Sales Head updated about competitor activity in the region. column2: The Role As a Funnel Growth Specialist, you'll play a vital role in driving NxtWave's growth by ensuring a seamless and engaging experience for potential students. You'll analyze our marketing and sales funnel, pinpoint areas for improvement, and design creative solutions to boost conversion rates at every stage of the funnel. This role demands a blend of analytical thinking, customer-centricity, and a passion for continuous optimization. Key Responsibilities Funnel Analysis:  Conduct in-depth analysis of the sales funnel to identify bottlenecks, drop-off points, and areas for optimization. Problem-Solving:  Generate creative and actionable solutions to address funnel leakages, working collaboratively with sales, marketing, and admissions teams. Campaign Ideation:  Design and implement targeted campaigns, outreach strategies, and re-engagement tactics to improve lead conversion throughout the funnel. Customer Empathy:  Develop a deep understanding of student motivations, pain points, and preferences to tailor solutions that enhance their experience. A/B Testing:  (If applicable) Propose and execute A/B tests on landing pages, call scripts, outreach tactics, etc., to validate optimization strategies. Metrics Tracking:  Define and monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) to track the success of optimization efforts and demonstrate impact. Qualifications and Background Education:  Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field (preferred, but not mandatory). Experience:  1+ years of experience as a business consultant or funnel analysis or similar customer-facing problem solving role would be advantageous. Analytical Mindset:  Proven ability to analyze data, identify trends, and derive actionable insights. Creative Problem-Solver:  Natural talent for generating innovative solutions, thinking outside the box, and challenging the status quo. Excellent Communicator:  Ability to articulate complex ideas clearly and present findings to stakeholders across teams. Customer-Centric:  Passionate about understanding customer needs and motivations to create a frictionless experience. Self-Starter:  Ability to work independently, manage multiple projects, and thrive in a fast-paced environment. Desired Skills (Bonus): Familiarity with marketing automation tools Basic copywriting or content creation skills Experience with A/B testing platforms Work Location:  Hyderabad(Work from Office)

column2: I) JOB DESCRIPTION:  1) Order execution & Business Support: Facilitating Business Team: Involve from the bidding stage with Distributors / OEM to get the better discount & Credit term which will enable business team to participate the bid competitively.  Facilitating Business team to arrange required Hardware & Software to conduct POC whenever there is a requirement. Execution of Orders for product & services of all practices - Screening of Customer RFP / Tenders / Vendor quote / PO / Technical compliances to ensure that all specifications & Terms and Conditions are in line with Customer requirements. Adherence to Company guidelines with respect to Margin, Terms and Conditions & Policy of the Company. Perform the negotiations with OEM / Distributors as per the SOP process document to choose the competitive vendor to place the PO. After going through the above documents, if any variations noticed the same needs to be sent to the business team to clarify. If the queries are still not in line with guidelines, then request the business team to seek Management approval to execute with variations. Once the order is approved for execution, then the project code needs to be generated and forwarded to the purchase team to handle the procurement function. Realization of Back-end rebate - Capture the back-end rebate details wherever applicable with OEM confirmation. Follow with respective OEM / Distributor to realize the same at the earliest. Monthly unbilled revenue provision needs to be submitted to the Finance team. Cost Saving  Based on effective negotiation performed with OEM / Distributor with respect to extended credit period, discounts & mode of payment, generate additional savings to Organization from Sales Operations. Maintain the TAT to release the PO & necessary documents to OEM / Distributors within the agreed timeline once all the queries are addressed by Business team. 2)   Contract Management & Automation of workflow: Managing the internal tool of Contract Management (CSMS)  Entering all the required information in the tool once the Order is cleared for execution and generate 16-digit project code against each & every Services Orders. Ensure to get the Billing and Collection details from all the regional offices on daily basis & update that information in the tool against respective project on daily basis. Circulate & follow up with regional MIS team on timely billing & collection for all the practices. If any delay is noticed, escalate to the next level, and get the proper justification for the delay. Complete BOM needs to be updated in the tool at the earliest against each project with complete Serials numbers to enable delivery team to log the customer service calls without which delivery team cannot log the services tickets. Renewal pending orders can be extended in the tool to continue the uninterrupted service to customers based on their mail confirmation and further approval from Head Delivery. This can be extended to a maximum of 30 days from the date of Expiry. A further period can be extended based on the approval from the management. Ensure there is no long overdue payment from the customer before approving the same. Ensure there are no long overdue pending payments from the Customer before approving the renewal orders. Need to get proper justification from Business team and escalate the same to finance team if required. Initiate the automation process with internal IT team wherever possible to reduce the manual interferences & enable to speed up the sales operation activities. All the documents need to be digitized with necessary approval and store the same in common folder (SVN Folder) which enable all the stakeholders to access the same wherever it is required including audit function. 3) Procurement & Logistics Function: On basis of order clearance from Order processing team, PO is placed on OEM / Distributor after verifying the vendor quote/ Margin approvals / technical compliance / BOM verification with Customer PO / part code / Bill to - Ship to details / GST numbers etc. Procurement for Internal requirement against CAPEX & REVEX the PO is placed after necessary internal approvals & finance numbering done. Need to interact with Internal IT team to facilitate this at the earliest. The procurement process should be initiated on a shortlisted vendor basis on L1 criteria wherever is possible. Wherever possible initiate final level of negotiations with respect to Extended credit days / Payment mode / additional discounts. Ensure while placing the PO on OEM / Distributor, the bill of material of Customer PO / our proposal / Vendor quote are matching with respect to configuration, Serial numbers, Service level agreement, Scope of work & Technical specifications. It is Sales Operation responsibility to share all the necessary documents to OEM / Distributors along with Customer PO as per the OEM compliance wherever applicable. Ensure our orders are loaded on OEM from distributor on time and get the order confirmation proof. With respect to service orders, seek Order activation proof from OEM / Distributor before processing vendor Invoices. Frequent follow up with OEM / Distributor on delivery status and circulate the updates to Business team periodically. The approximate EDD also circulated to the business team through weekly report. Put all the effort on effective follow up to get the material within the timeline agreed with the customer RFP to avoid the LD / Penalties imposed by customer. On receipt of material, coordinate with the distributor for faster delivery to our warehouse for inward the same to make sure that items are received as per the PO placed on them. If any, damage noticed the on the package received, the same needs to be recorded in the vendor invoice and escalate the same to OEM / Distributor & Business team for replacement or necessary corrections.     Once the material is inwarded the necessary GIRN report needs to be generated and to be forwarded to Finance for accounting. Invoice the same as per the customer PO and move the materials through Road / Air basis on the volume and urgency to deliver the same to customer as per the agreed timeline. The acknowledgement needs to be obtained from the customer as proof of successful delivery to account the revenue recognition in our books. 4) Vendor Management & OEM Relationship Management: Forward the OEM / Vendor Invoices with necessary documents like approvals / margin sheet to finance team for accounting.  Coordinate with Finance team to timely pay out the OEM / vendor payments as agreed.  Frequent discussion / meeting with OEM and Distributor is driven to maintain the smooth relationship as they play important role in clinching major deals against competition.  Facilitate to Issue ACH (Auto payment mode) to major distributors which reduced the considerable workload of Sales operations & finance teams time & reduced the follow ups from Distributors.  Based on the relationship negotiate on back-to-back payment mode like Escrow or Lien arrangement for major deals to facilitate business team to participate the deal more competitively. Wherever required, request for additional discount from OEM / Distributor to facilitate Business team to bid competitively. 5) Oracle Field Delivery partnership: Being one of the major partners of Oracle, signed a Field delivery partnership agreement. The same needs to be renewed year on year by adherence of KPI (Key Performance Index) structured by Oracle. Act as a single point of contact with Oracle services business team. Obtain renewal quote for existing renewal & raise RSR for new business to share the same to business team for bidding. Weekly ATR report (Available to Renew) updates need to be shared with Oracle to know them the visibility of business. Participate in the Quarterly Business Review with Oracle on achievement / Projection on ATR & KPI achievement etc. Develop the business relationship with Oracle account managers / Partner manager / BU directors to get the deferred payment term & AAR waiver wherever possible to support business team to clinch the order. 6) MIS Function & Reporting: Weekly achievement & projection report to be circulated to the business team on Booking, Billing & Billable cases for product & Services across all the practices. Periodic report needs to be sent to regional MIS team & follow up on timely renewal, billing & collection. Monthly closure report to be circulated to the finance team on Billing, Carry forward Income, Cost Provisions, Unbilled revenue, Purchase register, Projectwise billing / cost, Revenue projection for FY etc. Revenue recognition reports are required to be submitted to HR team. This needs to be submitted before the 5th of every month for the previous month. Quarterly reports are required to be submitted on Rebate provision, Penalty provision, OEMwise business achievement, revenue recognition etc. Quarterly Achievement report on Target & Gross Margin against each salesperson to be submitted to HR team. Yearly Reports are required to be submitted on overall performance of the FY & carry forward orders to next FY to Business team. 7) Adherence to Audit Policy & handle various audits: Audit activities need to be handled for Internal, Statutory & JSOX with respect to Contract management. Coordinate with Audit coordinator & participate discussion with auditors whenever there is a justification / clarifications required on contract management process / policies. Provide necessary samples to auditors and provide clarifications wherever demanded. Provide necessary justifications on observations raised by auditors & provide proper justifications and corrective actions. Amend the policy / process / guideline / SOP as suggested by Auditors after management approval. II) RELEVANT YEARS OF EXPERIENCE: Minimum 15+ years??Full-Stack-Order management, Procurement & Logistics functional experience  Handled business relations functions with OEMs & Distributors. Handled leadership functions on Sales Operations. Prior experience of having worked in a Technology / IT consulting firm in the sales operations is mandatory.     Excellent interpersonal skills coupled with stakeholder management. Experience with enhancing employee engagement culture and Company?? image as a great place to work. Strong operational business acumen, executive presence, and adaptive work style. Proven influencer and consensus builder: demonstrated ability to provide sound advice and counsel to Operational Leaders and executive level management. Strong interpersonal, written, and oral communication, and facilitation skills which will enable him/her to interact with a range of personalities and styles and be able to establish effective relationships of all levels of the organization. Demonstrated ability to multi-task and balance numerous priorities to drive Sales Operations processes and deliver high quality of services in a fast- paced operational environment. Takes ownership; ability to set a strategy and motivate others to achieve necessary deliverables. Demonstrated ability to manage a team of Sales Operations professionals. Roate the functions between sales operations team to create redundancies. Strong project and process management skills with demonstrated track record of delivering results.

column2: The role of the      Sales Operations Analyst     delivers critical insights for the frontline teams at Lynk.                  The individual will work alongside senior stakeholders in the organization to develop and upgrade CRM systems and other databases, data collection systems, and manage basic statistical analysis for frontline teams.                             What You'll Do             Support Lynk s overall CRM program and strategy by understanding lead management and routing processes, lead development workflows, sales process strategy, and platform capabilities that leverage marketing automation and sales operations to drive pipeline visibility and revenue growth.         Serve as primary system administrator and go-to expert for the HubSpot CRM. Handle all basic day-to-day functions, including user account maintenance, configurations, permissions, data cleanliness, and other routine items.         Build and manage all go-to-market related reporting and KPI tracking. Aid GTM leadership in analyzing data trends and uncovering key insights related to improving KPIs. Develop and manage the reporting capabilities that track the revenue attribution associated to marketing and sales activities.         Manage and maintain all relevant third-party system integrations with HubSpot. Manage security settings and partner with Tech for security audits.         Create documentation, guide and educate how to use a CRM for different use cases, policies and procedures. Design and conduct periodic training sessions for frontline teams on HubSpot management.         Monitor sales and marketing campaign results to increase engagement, improve responses, and ensure maximum return on efforts.         Monitor system performance and user activity to make recommendations and deploy continuous improvements. Manage all new user setups, permissioning, and deactivation, including transferring ownership of records for deactivated users.         Assist cross-functional teams and internal resources to define process requirements and change requests related to the sales processes.         Oversees data integrity within HubSpot CRM, Marketing, and Sales modules through data import management, data auditing, and clean-up.             What Expertise You'll Add To The Team             Bachelors/Masters degree with a strong academic track record         Candidates should understand all aspects of HubSpot configuration and technical/functional capabilities.         1-2+ years of experience as a CRM administrator experience is a plus.         HubSpot Sales, HubSpot Marketing Software, Service Hub certifications preferred.         Proficiency in MS Excel with strong analytical skills with the ability to collect, organize, analyze, and disseminate significant amounts of information with attention to detail and accuracy.          Excellent communication skills with a strong command of English            The ability to work in a fast-paced environment and handle multiple projects concurrently               What We Commit To You                     Competitive remuneration package in a rapidly-expanding growth stage global company         An environment that respects diversity and inclusion         Comprehensive medical insurance coverage           Generous leave policy

column2: Job description We are looking for a motivated and experienced Commercial Manager to join our team. As a Commercial Manager, you will be responsible for all commercial activities and management of our sales operations team. Prefered candidates from Western suburbs 1.Below are the duties and responsibilities: Data Management & Analytics   Managing booking and sales execution numbers / reports Oversee the Sales funnel for sales team for PAN India  Analyze and present sales MIS to Management  Maintaining historic database for trend analysis  Maintaining customer database and their business reports  Credit Control   Fixing credit limit for customers based on their past years business trends  Analyzing payment cycle to determine the credibility of customers  Ensuring timely payments from customers  Clearance to production for manufacturing and / or dispatch based on credit control status  Vigilance in allocating credit limits to new customers  Sales Operations   Ensuring registration of sales orders in the ERP system  Speed up the process by regular followup with various departments  Streamlining cross functional issues which affect the sales execution  Strategic business partner Data and inputs on potential customers through market intelligence & research  Handling third party commissions and sales promotion activities Manage corporate gifting plans Present sales operations roadmap during Annual Sales Meet 2. KEY INTERFACES / INTERACTS External Interfaces -  Customers  Internal Interfaces ( Other than Direct Reportees) -  Department Incharges, Management, Sales Engineers 3.KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS AND ABILITIES   Education  (degree / diploma) -  Graduate, MBA (preferred) Experience -  10-15 years handling sales operations of mid-sized, multi-product manufacturing company Knowledge and Skills -  Very good familiarity with Word, Excel, Outlook, Powerpoint, etc. Spreadsheets in particular. Good familiarity with ERP. Knowledge of GST, delivery challan and order registration. Ability to give presentations.  Leadership / Managerial Attributes -  Good communication skills including ability to draft good quality letters / mails. Ability to influence decision making. Extroverted and smooth personality. Self-motivated, hardworking, willing to shoulder responsibility and work independently. Handling team of 8-10 backend sales support staff  Other requirements -  2 or 3 years service commitment Designation -  Asst Manager / Dy Manager / Manager - Commercial (Head of Sales Operations) - Depending on experience and knowledge. Reporting to -  VP  Location -  Andheri, Mumbai. Travel to other locations (Very rare) , if needed. Duty time -  900 to 1815, 2nd & 3rd Saturday off every month 4.RADIX PERSPECTIVE ON THE POSITION AND THE CANDIDATE Radix is a successful and progressive engineering technology company, with a large customer base in India. Radix offers a good employee an opportunity to far outstrip their potential growth in almost any other company, including large companies. At the 10+ lakh level, we have a large number of employees who have been in the company for 10 or more years, and are expected to be there for life. We value hard work, diligence and initiative. We are looking for motivated individuals who are willing to shoulder responsibility and work independently. For the right candidate, Radix offers diverse job responsibilities and an unlimited growth path. 5.ABOUT RADIX 43 year old company Founded by the current MD, Mr. Sameer Shah, B. Tech from IIT Bombay, in 1980 Principal activities : Instrumentation Manufacturing and Industrial Automation  Measurement of Temperature, Pressure, Level, Flow Products : RTDs, Controllers, Transmitters, Humidity Sensors, Indicators and Isolators  Industrial Automation in the Pharmaceutical & other industries Four manufacturing facilities at Mumbai, Navi Mumbai and Pune Large R&D Center All-India sales network About 580 people work at Radix 2022-23 : 100+ crore sales

column2: The main purpose of this role is to provide adequate product support for a broad range of products, which will enable the customer-facing teams to address customer requirements with a technically viable and commercially competitive solution. The role is perfect for technical-commercial potentials who have the ambition to work in a multinational environment, interacting cross-functionally and benefiting from developing a broad network across the organization within their career. Whilst being in this role, you will obtain both market as well as competitive insights within the various vertical markets and applications through your close interaction with the sales teams throughout the entire end-user buying journey.                     Responsibilities will include support Europe region, pricing analysis, and sales programs management. This position will ensure that all the Whole goods & Aftermarket strategies and programs are in alignment with Sales, Product Management, Engineering and Operations.                       Responsibilities:                       Assist with managing product lifecycle of current product portfolio                  Develop seasonal, product focused, and time-limited special sales (if requested) to both build pipeline orders and affect immediate sales.                  Recommend stocking and production volumes based on knowledge of markets and commercial insights or sales forecast                  Assure communication of the portfolio offerings to internal and external sales channels                  Support market intelligence / price analysis for whole goods                  Take on additional assignments as needed within the region / PM/ Engineering team that support business and personal developmental needs                  Review pipeline with the different sales leaders.                  Review and update the price book                  Create or update price pages in the different sales systems                  Create sales and selection tools                   Develop tools, papers and libraries which are user-friendly and easy to use                      Look into continuous process improvement and refine standard work where needed.                      (Co-)Lead product trainings throughout the sales channel in the region as well as facilitate end-customer specific product trainings                      In addition, you will contribute as an active member in the NPI (New Product Introduction) process for dedicated growth opportunities within the region.                     Draft Communication & be the catalyst with marketing team for releasing communication on free stock, promotion, stock liquidation etc.                             Experience:                       3-5+ years working in a business environment, preferably with some manufacturing experience and exposure to lean practices and philosophy is desirable                  Prior experience in a product specialist role, manufacturing or marketing is a plus but not required                  Industry experience with air compressor systems is a plus                       Qualifications:                       A bachelors or associates degree in Engineering, marketing, business or related                       Key Competencies:                       Problem solving                  Passionately customer focused with a drive for continuous improvement                  Excellent communication skills

column2: The role of the      Sales Operations Analyst     delivers critical insights for the frontline teams at Lynk.                  The individual will work alongside senior stakeholders in the organization to develop and upgrade CRM systems and other databases, data collection systems, and manage basic statistical analysis for frontline teams.                             What You'll Do             Support Lynk s overall CRM program and strategy by understanding lead management and routing processes, lead development workflows, sales process strategy, and platform capabilities that leverage marketing automation and sales operations to drive pipeline visibility and revenue growth.         Serve as primary system administrator and go-to expert for the HubSpot CRM. Handle all basic day-to-day functions, including user account maintenance, configurations, permissions, data cleanliness, and other routine items.         Build and manage all go-to-market related reporting and KPI tracking. Aid GTM leadership in analyzing data trends and uncovering key insights related to improving KPIs. Develop and manage the reporting capabilities that track the revenue attribution associated to marketing and sales activities.         Manage and maintain all relevant third-party system integrations with HubSpot. Manage security settings and partner with Tech for security audits.         Create documentation, guide and educate how to use a CRM for different use cases, policies and procedures. Design and conduct periodic training sessions for frontline teams on HubSpot management.         Monitor sales and marketing campaign results to increase engagement, improve responses, and ensure maximum return on efforts.         Monitor system performance and user activity to make recommendations and deploy continuous improvements. Manage all new user setups, permissioning, and deactivation, including transferring ownership of records for deactivated users.         Assist cross-functional teams and internal resources to define process requirements and change requests related to the sales processes.         Oversees data integrity within HubSpot CRM, Marketing, and Sales modules through data import management, data auditing, and clean-up.             What Expertise You'll Add To The Team             Bachelors/Masters degree with a strong academic track record         Candidates should understand all aspects of HubSpot configuration and technical/functional capabilities.         1-2+ years of experience as a CRM administrator experience is a plus.         HubSpot Sales, HubSpot Marketing Software, Service Hub certifications preferred.         Proficiency in MS Excel with strong analytical skills with the ability to collect, organize, analyze, and disseminate significant amounts of information with attention to detail and accuracy.          Excellent communication skills with a strong command of English            The ability to work in a fast-paced environment and handle multiple projects concurrently               What We Commit To You                     Competitive remuneration package in a rapidly-expanding growth stage global company         An environment that respects diversity and inclusion         Comprehensive medical insurance coverage           Generous leave policy

column2: Smart infrastructure from Siemens makes the world a more connected and caring place - where resources are valued, where impact on the world is considered, where sustainable energy is delivered reliably and efficiently     It provides the flexible infrastructure to allow society to evolve and respond to changing conditions     Technology and the ingenuity of people come together to be at one with our environments and to care for our world     We do this from the macro to the micro level, from physical products, components and systems to connected, cloud-based digital offerings and services     Siemens offers a broad portfolio of grid control and automation; low- and medium-voltage power distribution, switching and control; and building automation, fire safety and security, HVAC control and energy solutions               You ll receive order from sales/acquisition team.         You ll prepare transfer the Techno-commercial order to Order Manager Works with Gate-1 execution / NXTOOL transfer, if applicable         You ll perform the Commercial checks (Payment terms, LD etc.) as well as offer validity of B/O materials         You ll co-ordinate and obtain the technical clarification / attend KOM with Customer.         You ll submit drawings to customers, incorporate customers comments and will visit customers for approvals if required.         You ll plan the order for manufacturing in line with contractual delivery and approvals (milestone).         You ll be responsible for change and claim management and maintain/ exceed profitability of order.         You ll arrange for dispatch clearance from customer co-ordinate with factory for dispatch         You ll be handling of bought-out equipment like bus duct, Control and relay panels, adaptors, site activity, etc         You ll be responsible for closing the order as per contractual scope within approved timeline.         You ll be responsible for handling post-supply/site queries and creating the CFR on receipt of quality related site complaints and coordinating with CS logistics team for dispatches         You ve a good knowledge of switchgear fundamentals, great understanding and interpretation of customer technical specifications and Single Line Diagram.         You ve a sound background of Medium Low Voltage products / Systems.         You ve good communication skills with great Customer orientation and have got hands on experience in MS Excel Power Point.         You ve preferably Customer handling experience         You ve mandatory to have English fluency in written and verbal communication.

column2: The Role As a Funnel Growth Specialist, you'll play a vital role in driving NxtWave's growth by ensuring a seamless and engaging experience for potential students. You'll analyze our marketing and sales funnel, pinpoint areas for improvement, and design creative solutions to boost conversion rates at every stage of the funnel. This role demands a blend of analytical thinking, customer-centricity, and a passion for continuous optimization. Key Responsibilities Funnel Analysis:  Conduct in-depth analysis of the sales funnel to identify bottlenecks, drop-off points, and areas for optimization. Problem-Solving:  Generate creative and actionable solutions to address funnel leakages, working collaboratively with sales, marketing, and admissions teams. Campaign Ideation:  Design and implement targeted campaigns, outreach strategies, and re-engagement tactics to improve lead conversion throughout the funnel. Customer Empathy:  Develop a deep understanding of student motivations, pain points, and preferences to tailor solutions that enhance their experience. A/B Testing:  (If applicable) Propose and execute A/B tests on landing pages, call scripts, outreach tactics, etc., to validate optimization strategies. Metrics Tracking:  Define and monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) to track the success of optimization efforts and demonstrate impact. Qualifications and Background Education:  Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field (preferred, but not mandatory). Experience:  1+ years of experience as a business consultant or funnel analysis or similar customer-facing problem solving role would be advantageous. Analytical Mindset:  Proven ability to analyze data, identify trends, and derive actionable insights. Creative Problem-Solver:  Natural talent for generating innovative solutions, thinking outside the box, and challenging the status quo. Excellent Communicator:  Ability to articulate complex ideas clearly and present findings to stakeholders across teams. Customer-Centric:  Passionate about understanding customer needs and motivations to create a frictionless experience. Self-Starter:  Ability to work independently, manage multiple projects, and thrive in a fast-paced environment. Desired Skills (Bonus): Familiarity with marketing automation tools Basic copywriting or content creation skills Experience with A/B testing platforms Work Location:  Hyderabad(Work from Office)

column2: "Our vision for Pre-Sales Engineering is to build ""The words best experiential technology sales team"".  Pre-Sales Engineering Mission: We are the trusted technical partner for our clients. We show value by delivering a co-creation experience in order to progress opportunities to client purchase. The PTS delivers this mission and vison through by developing partner technical capacity for both Ecosystem Partners and for the Select Client Segment. As a Partner Technical Specialist, your mission is to influence and develop the Ecosystem technical capacity to positively generate repeatable scale that ultimately is reflected in an increase in IBM's revenue. Your technical expertise (measured by skill and delivered via POX) is what differentiates you, and IBM, in the ecosystem space. Through this expertise, you expand our ecosystem partner and clients business horizons for your speciality (Automation) Your Role and Responsibilities Technical skills in Automation Portfolio to support partner's Sell opportunities. Working with Ecosystem Partners, influence clients' technology strategy through IBM Brand Solution proposals, technical proofs, and compelling value propositions. Win with Ecosystem Partners against competitors by co-developing a superior technical solution and delivering maximum client business value. Proactively identify and engage with Ecosystem partners to progress technology opportunities in your territory resulting in the successful sale and deployment of IBM Solutions Co-sell and collaborate with Ecosystem partners to deliver winning solutions to our clients. Required Technical and Professional Expertise Minimum 4-7 years of experience in Automation technologies. Experiential selling including co-creation and hands-on technical sales methods such as: demos, custom demos, Proofs of concept, * Minimum Viable Products (MVPs) or other technical proofs Build deep brand (Data & AI) expertise to assist partners to deliver PoX (Custom Demo, PoC, MVP, etc.) to progress opportunities. Identifying partners with skills, expertise, and experience Identify partner capacity and assist partners in building capacity Defining actions, plays, campaigns and resources to Build the Territory Partner Capacity Exceptional interpersonal and communication skills, and an ability to collaborate effectively with Ecosystem Partners, clients and sales professionals.  Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise Technical skills in IBM's Automation Portfolio to support partner's Sell opportunities Experience of successfully engaging with Ecosystem Partners and clients to identify, progress and win IBM Technology sales opportunities. Demonstrate how IBM Technology addresses Client, Market, and Industry trends are relevant to the partner, looking for ways to increase cross-sell opportunities for the partner.

column2: Title : Store Manager  Bakery Raw Materials Location : [Walltax, Chennai] Job Type : Full-Time Salary : 4-6L per year + Performance based incentives Why Join Viveka Essence Mart? Established Leader: 37 years as a top essence dealer in South India. Broad Exposure: Distributors for a wide array of prestigious industry brands. Career Growth: Clear opportunities for advancement within the company. Industry Respect: Work with market leaders and earn professional respect. Join our team and contribute to a legacy of excellence and innovation. Job Description: We are seeking an experienced and dynamic Store Manager to oversee our bakery raw materials store. As the cornerstone of our retail operations, you will drive sales, manage our inventory, and ensure operational excellence, contributing directly to our financial success and customer satisfaction. Key Responsibilities: 1. Sales Role: Drive the sales to improve overall turnover and achieve specific targets for designated brands. Responsibilities: Develop and implement sales strategies to meet or exceed sales targets. Actively engage with customers to build relationships and understand their needs, enhancing customer satisfaction and loyalty. Organise and lead sales promotions and initiatives to boost brand visibility and sales volume. Reporting: Generate daily, weekly, and monthly sales reports to track progress against targets, analyse sales trends, and adjust strategies as needed. 2. Inventory Management Role: Oversee the inventory reporting personnel to ensure accurate stock levels, minimise losses due to damage or expiry, and adjust inventory based on sales trends and customer feedback. Responsibilities: Coordinate with the inventory team to maintain accurate and transparent inventory records. Review and verify reports from inventory personnel to ensure clarity and accuracy in stock data. Strategise to move unsold goods effectively, considering specific customer requirements and feedback. Reporting: Maintain regular inventory reports, including status updates, damage or expiry issues, and actions taken to address any discrepancies. 3. Financial Management Role: Manage the stores financial health by overseeing cash flow, budgeting, and financial planning to ensure profitability. Responsibilities: Monitor financial transactions and cash flow to ensure that finances are handled appropriately. Plan and control the budget to avoid over-ordering or under-stocking, which could impact profitability. Communicate financial status and any significant changes to management through detailed reports. Reporting: Provide comprehensive financial reports that compare actual spending to budgets, analyse cash flow, and detail profitability metrics. 4. Operations Role: Ensure smooth store operations, maintaining efficiency and customer satisfaction. Responsibilities: Oversee daily store operations to ensure they run without any issues. Implement operational improvements to enhance efficiency and customer service by actively soliciting and responding to customer feedback. Ensure compliance with all company policies and legal requirements. Reporting: Regular operations reports detailing compliance, efficiency metrics, and any operational issues with their resolutions. 5. Point of Contact for Management Role: Serve as the primary liaison between the store staff and the higher management, ensuring transparency and efficient communication. Responsibilities: Act as the main conduit for communication between the store and management, ensuring that all relevant information, concerns, and feedback are accurately and promptly relayed. Organise and lead regular update meetings or conference calls with management to discuss the stores performance, strategic direction, and operational issues. Manage and coordinate responses to any directives or queries from management. Reporting: Prepare comprehensive monthly and quarterly management reports summarising the stores overall performance, challenges, and strategic initiatives. Future Responsibilities: Marketing and Strategy Development: Once initial systems are automated and stable, take on responsibilities for marketing and strategic growth initiatives. Compliance and Safety: Incorporate regular checks and updates to ensure all operations comply with safety standards and legal regulations. Requirements: Languages: Tamil, English, Hindi Must. Preferred with Telugu as well Experience: Minimum 5-8 years in retail store management, Sales and in Baking industry Educational Qualification: Any basic graduation. Preferably with MBA In Sales

Scope   and   general   purpose   of   job: ??The Assistant Sales and Administration Manager position within the  Executive Education Institute provides essential support to the Director in  achieving sales targets, managing administrative tasks, and fostering client  relationships. ??This role requires a proactive and organized individual with excellent  communication skills and a strong attention to detail. Sales   Support: ??Assist the Director in developing and implementing sales strategies to meet revenue targets and enrolment goals. ??Conduct market research to identify potential clients and opportunities for business development. ??Collaborate with the marketing team to create promotional materials and campaigns to attract prospective clients. ??Respond to inquiries from clients, provide information about executive education programs, and coordinate enrolment processes. ??Schedule appointments, meetings, and follow-ups with clients to discuss program offerings and address their needs.   2. column1: Costing and Sales Support - Infrastructure Pumping Systems
column2: Job Title: Costing and Sales Support - Infrastructure Pumping Systems Industry Focus:  Pumping Solutions / Infrastructure / Civil Engineering  Work Arrangement: Full Time Remote Position Career Path:  Explore a journey of long-term possibilities. Location : Company based in NSW Australia (Remote  Work from Home) Work Hours:  3:30 am to 12:30 pm IST (8:00 am to 5:00 pm AEST - Australian Time) Work Schedule:  Monday to Friday. About SKILL HUB: Unleash Your Potential with Skill Hub: Your Gateway to Global Career Growth. At Skill Hub, we're more than just a staffing solutions provider; we are a global leader in managing offshore teams in India. We prioritize your well-being as much as your career growth. Enjoy the flexibility of remote work and a standard Monday to Friday schedule, allowing a work-life balance. Skill Hub is where your career takes flight. Client Company Overview: The candidate will be working for our Australian-based client company, a renowned leader in providing Quality Pumping Solutions with over 45 years of industry expertise. The company designs and supplies custom water and sewer pump stations across ACT, NSW, and Queensland. They offer tailored consultations and a wide range of pump solutions, including wastewater pump station, filtration, rainwater harvesting, stormwater management, and more. The candidate will collaborate closely with the design and infrastructure team and report directly to the Sales Manager. Job   Profile: Infrastructure Pumping Systems Design and Costing 1) Pumping System Design and Report Preparation: Thoroughly review documentation received from company's clients including Pumps  specifications, plans & drawings , and relevant standards to ensure accuracy and compliance. Proficient in  pump selection methodologies , considering factors such as flow rates, pressure requirements, fluid properties, and so on. Utilize company's  online pump selecting programs/software  to select correct pump for the project. Utilize companys specific  Design tools,  such as Excel spreadsheets and engineering expertise to create Pump Station requirements in detail. Conduct thorough analysis of  hydraulic systems , including pumps, piping, valves, level sensors, and so on, to design the Pumping System. Adhere to relevant Industry standards and regulations, conducting thorough  checks to ensure design compliance  and quality. Prepare necessary reports for presentation to both the sales team and their clients. Work closely with Pump Station Designing and Drafting team to develop proposals and presentations aligning with the company's client specifications and project deadlines.  Respond promptly to companys client requests, maintaining clear and professional communication at all the time. 2) Project Estimating, Costing and Procurement: Develop accurate  project estimation and costings  based on developed designs, analyzing specifications, adhering to Company's templates and guidelines.  Prepare  product requirements  based on design specifications for submitting to suppliers. Collaborate with suppliers  to obtain proposals and prepare project estimates, ensuring adherence to budgetary requirements. 3) Sales Presentation Preparation: Prepare compelling  project sales presentation  based on Companys templates and incorporate relevant project details. Prepare detailed  customer proposals  using Companys templates to support the sales team. Collaborate closely with the sales team  to analyze information provided by companys clients. 4)   Project Folder Organization: Prepare  project job folders  with attention to detail, compiling and organizing relevant information received from company's clients. Establish and maintain a comprehensive  folder structure , segregating and organizing relevant information for easy access and reference for the team. Essential Skills (Must Have): Exceptional written and verbal communication skills in English are mandatory, as the candidate is working with Australian company. Mechanical engineering candidates with an expertise of pumping systems; those with fundamental knowledge of civil engineering are preferred. Civil engineering candidates with an expertise of pumping system are also suitable.  A minimum of  2-4 years of experience with the pumps & pumping systems  industry, including understanding the design and selection of pumps is necessary, with an overall minimum of  5-10 years of professional experience . Proficiency in  interpreting Pumping System designs and preparing estimating and costing  to suit that design. Proficiency in  Office 365 tools  such as Microsoft Outlook, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and MS Teams is required for seamless communication and collaboration. Availability to work during Australian business hours is essential. Ability to learn and adapt to new systems. Desirable Skills: Fundamental knowledge of AutoCAD and Drafting will be an additional advantage. Exceptional organizational skills, including the ability to effectively manage multiple tasks and priorities, are desirable. Strong analytical and problem-solving capabilities are required for this role. Demonstrated ability to work autonomously and efficiently, with minimal supervision Benefits of working with SKILL HUB: Long-Term Opportunity:  Join a team committed to long-term career growth, providing stability and opportunities for advancement. Excellent Team Environment:  Thrive in a supportive and friendly work environment, where collaboration and teamwork are encouraged. Exciting Career Growth:  Elevate your career by collaborating with global teams, opening doors to endless possibilities for advancement and learning. Work from Anywhere:  Enjoy the flexibility of remote work, giving you the freedom to balance your professional and personal life seamlessly. All-in-One Setup : Gear up for success with all the essential tools provided, including desktops, laptops, headphones, and more, ensuring you're equipped for peak performance. Balanced Schedule:  Enjoy a standard five-day workweek, providing ample time to recharge and pursue personal interests outside of work.

With 2200+ employees spread across 6 countries on 4 continents, we are always on the lookout for smart individuals who believe in constant learning, are unafraid of experimentation, and have an entrepreneurial growth mindset. With our eyes set on the future, we are looking for energetic, outcome-oriented professionals to join our team of experts in Hyderabad. As an  Account   Executive , will reach out to potential clientele to set up advisory phone calls, and pitch product best practices to promote adoption. Role   &   Responsibilities:  Grow revenues from SMB clients in your book of business and consistently achieve or exceed quota expectations.  Achieve quarterly client coverage via customer calls and depth of engagement goals.  Achieve quarterly meeting goals for Tier 1 and Tier 2 clients.  Leverage existing and new relationships with current accounts to grow revenue in strategic product areas.  Develop and execute a strategic plan for your book of business leveraging various tools and processes for book segmentation and engagement.  Develop and maintain subject matter expertise on Marketing Solutions offerings.  Educate clients on their opportunities using your digital media expertise and be an expert at translating their marketing goals and objectives into actionable strategies on Marketing Platform.  Provide updates to the management team on your pipeline and sales forecast and Objectives and Key results.  Be proactive about solving problems and be ready to take on additional initiatives and responsibilities as they emerge. Qualication:  1 - 2+ years of work experience in sales, account management or a closely related function  Exceptional written and verbal communication skills  Knowledge of how Internet advertising technology works and the ability to explain it in ordinary terms.  Proven ability to work in a fast-paced dynamic environment.  Proven ability to navigate change, Multitasking & Collaboration  Skilled using Microsoft Oce (Excel, Word and PowerPoint) or G Suite (Sheets, Docs and Slides). Preferred   Qualications:  Proven communication skills across multiple channels (e.g., virtual meetings, phone, and email)  Experience building relationships with top marketing decision-makers through calls and emails.    Proven ability in activating and retaining new business.  Proven ability to manage a sizable volume of clients/accounts.  Experience in digital or social media sales.  Experience in marketing or in a role making recommendations to marketers. Why   You   Should   Join:   Impactful   Work:  You'll have the chance to make a real difference by driving growth for our clients and contributing to the success of our team.   Continuous   Growth:  We're committed to helping you develop and grow both personally and professionally, with opportunities for advancement and ongoing learning.   Collaborative   Environment:  You'll be part of a supportive and collaborative team where your ideas are valued, and your contributions are recognized.   Cutting-Edge   Industry:  Dive into the dynamic world of digital marketing and advertising technology, staying ahead of the curve with the latest trends and innovations.   Competitive   Benets:  Enjoy competitive compensation, comprehensive benets, and perks designed to support your well-being and success.

column2: After Sales Engineers_ CNC/ VMC Machine Spare Parts/ AMC _ German's CNC/ 5-Axis Machines Manufacturing MNC   The position mostly involves to promote spare parts of the Company's world class machines, Overhauling, AMC of post warranty machines etc., Those who are meeting the our requirement criteria and can join asap, Please share CVs to jagannaath@kamms.net or whatsapp to 7092689999   ONSITE: There will be 2-3 months onsite to GERMANY for world class Engineering Excellency training and KT as well.   Company will provide world class Benefits apart from excellent onsite allowances of around  90Euros/day   THE KIND OF TRAINING YOU ATTAIN IS LIFE TIME LEARNING. The main purpose of the position is to meet customers of the Company across India(Wherever the Company has sold its machines) and promote spare parts/Machine Accessories and AMC for post warranty of the machines. No Cold calling and field work required.   The company is family oriented 100 years old German Machine tools OEM MNC with manufacturing plants in more than 10 Countries and business operations spread across the Globe - Europe, US, China and India. Now they are coming up with state of the art Manufacturing Plant at Penugonda, Anantapur District of Andhrapradesh. They give utmost priority for the welfare of the employee and the another beauty is that there is no retirement age in this company so that you can work as long as you can work. Those who are looking for long term, say minimum 5 years only need to apply...   Position Name: After Sales Engineers Position Type: Full time Base Location: Penukonda Anantpur (Near Bangalore. 2 hours drive from Bangalore Airport)  Position Roles and Responsibilities This Position is responsible to create real customer value by selling our service products from spare parts to Service Products like condition monitoring, Maintenance contracts, Overhauls, Retools and Modernization etc. in Indian market. Position is the first point of contact, sparring partner and consultant for our existing customers and identify their Service needs. Position needs inspire potential new customers with our service products. Position needs to contribute the expertise of several years to the development or further development of our service products Requirement - Strong Technical Sales Knowledge in CNC Machine Tool Manufacturing Industries. - Able to present know how the technical service products works. - Strong communication skills to figure out how to add a value to our customers. - willing to use about 60% of your working time for client visits. - Basic Knowledge in CNC Machines Service - Bachelors Degree / Diploma in Mechanical Engineering preferred - 3 - 5 years relevant Sales experience preferably from CNC Machine Tool Manufacturing industry - Read and follow mechanical, hydraulic, pneumatic and electrical prints/drawings related to Machine Tools. - Having an in-depth knowledge of Mechanical Drawings, Part Prints, Drawing Tolerances, Quality Requirements of Parts being produced on Machines or Similar Products and an understanding of assembly technology and/or metal cutting principles will have added advantage. General Requirements Ability to travel as required for business needs Self-motivated; able to work alone or in a team environment Ability to obtain and maintain a valid passport Those who are meeting the our requirement criteria and can join asap, Please share CVs to jagannaath@kamms.net or whatsapp to 7092689999

column2: About Maintenance World:  Maintenance World specializes in comprehensive pre and post water damage services. We collaborate extensively with insurance companies, builders, owner corporations, and real estate companies to provide top-tier emergency solutions.  Major opportunity for a GUN appointment setter to make 6 figures a year, 100% working from the comfort of your own home.  You would be joining an established Melbourne based company with growth opportunities galore!  Check out the offer below and if you are the right fit then follow the application instructions at the end.  Job Description:  We are seeking a motivated and results-driven Remote Outbound Sales Representative to expand our customer base and drive our business success. This role involves strategic outreach to potential clients, promoting our specialized services, and closing sales remotely. If you thrive in a fast-paced environment and are skilled in navigating sales conversations, we want you on our team.  Responsibilities:   Conduct proactive outbound sales calls and send emails to prospective clients using provided leads.  Identify key decision-makers, qualify leads based on specific criteria, and nurture client relationships.  Present and demonstrate the value of our services remotely, tailoring solutions to meet client needs.  Employ consultative selling techniques to fully understand potential client requirements and recommend appropriate services.  Manage objections and negotiate terms to close appointment effectively.  Keep accurate and timely records of client interactions and sales activities within our CRM system.  Collaborate with team members to enhance sales strategies and achieve collective goals.  Stay well-informed about product developments, industry trends, and competitors.  Requirements:   Proven record of accomplishment in outbound sales, with experience in a remote sales environment highly regarded.  Exceptional communication skills, both verbal and written.  Demonstrated ability to build rapport and engage clients effectively over the phone and other digital communication platforms.  Strong negotiation and sales closing skills.  Self-motivated and able to work independently in a remote setting.  Proficiency with Zoho CRM software and remote communication tools.  Bachelor's degree in business, Marketing, or related field preferred.  Benefits:   Competitive salary with performance-based Great incentives.  Flexible working hours.  Comprehensive training and ongoing professional development.  Opportunities for career advancement within the company.  Virtual Job, Fully Remote, Working from Home  How to Apply:  To apply for this exciting opportunity, please follow the steps below:  WhatsApp Application : Send a WhatsApp message to +61456003004 with your name, location, and the role you are applying for. Include a 60-second video or audio introduction explaining why you are a great fit for the role.  Email : Send your resume to  info@maintenanceworld.com.au  ensure your application is complete.  Please note : Only applications submitted through the outlined processes will be considered.  Join Maintenance World and be part of a dedicated team committed to excellence and customer satisfaction in the water damage restoration industry. We look forward to seeing your application and learning what makes you the best candidate for this role!

column2: Job Overview: As a Support Specialist, you will be responsible for providing technical assistance and resolving software-related issues for our customers. You will serve as the primary point of contact for users encountering difficulties with our software products, offering guidance, troubleshooting, and ensuring a seamless user experience. Your role will involve effective communication, problem-solving, and collaboration with internal teams to address customer needs and improve product functionality. Responsibilities: Provide timely and effective support to customers via various channels such as phone, email or chat. Diagnose software problems reported by customers, utilizing available resources and tools to identify root causes. Document customer inquiries, reported issues, and resolutions in a detailed and organized manner, maintaining accurate records for reference and knowledge sharing. Comprehend new requirements of customers to development team. Collaborate with channel partners in delivering joint customer engagements. Maintain a thorough understanding of our software products, features, and functionality, staying up to date with new releases and updates. Provide user training, guidance, and best practices to customers as needed to optimize their use of the software and minimize support requests. Learn and apply product/domain knowledge in support engagements. Qualification: Any bachelors degree 0- 2 years experience as customer service or support Good knowledge in Basic Hardware & Software skills Excellent communication skills, both with the ability to convey technical concepts to non-technical users effectively. Analytical mindset with strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail Proficiency in customer service principles and practices, with a focus on responsiveness, empathy, and professionalism.

column2: Responsibilities: 1. Knowledge and experience in generating B2B and B2C sales. 2. Respond promptly and professionally to  buyers and customer  inquiries via various channels, including phone calls, emails, live chats, social media platforms and sales software. 3.Provide accurate information about products, services, promotions, and company policies to customers and buyers. 3.Assist buyers/customers with order placement, tracking, cancellations, returns, and exchanges, ensuring a smooth and hassle-free process. 5.Address buyers/customer complaints and resolve issues efficiently, aiming for first-call resolution whenever possible. 6.Maintain a thorough understanding of the company's products, services, and promotions to effectively assist buyers/customers and provide appropriate recommendations. 7.Document and update B2B/B2C interactions, transactions, and inquiries in the customer relationship management (CRM) system. 8.Collaborate with internal teams, including logistics, warehouse, and quality assurance, to ensure timely resolution of buyers/customer concerns and follow-up on pending issues. 9.Identify and escalate complex or recurring B2B/B2C issues to the appropriate department for further investigation and resolution. 10.Strive to achieve key performance indicators (KPIs) related to buyer/customer satisfaction, response time, resolution time, and quality of service. 11.Stay up to date with industry trends, product knowledge, and customer service best practices to continuously improve the buyer/customer care experience. Requirements: 1.Previous experience in a B2B/B2C sales generation or customer care role, preferably in the e-commerce industry. 2.Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to effectively communicate with buyers/customers in a professional and courteous manner. 3.Strong problem-solving and decision-making abilities to address buyer/customer concerns and provide appropriate solutions. 4.Empathy and patience in dealing with buyer/customer inquiries and complaints, maintaining a customer-centric approach at all times. 5.Proficient computer skills and familiarity with customer relationship management (CRM) systems, email platforms, and live chat software. 6.Ability to multitask and prioritize effectively in a fast-paced environment, while maintaining attention to detail. 7.Strong organizational and time management skills, with the ability to meet deadlines and handle a high volume of B2B/B2C interactions. 8.Flexibility to work in shifts, including evenings, weekends, and holidays, based on business needs. 9.Passion for fashion and a genuine interest in providing an exceptional shopping experience to customers/buyers. Lead Generation and Prospecting: Develop and implement lead generation strategies to identify and qualify potential clients, including solar developers, project developers, utilities, and commercial/industrial entities. Utilize various channels such as cold calling, email campaigns, networking events, and industry conferences to generate new business leads. Client Relationship Management: Cultivate and maintain strong relationships with existing clients and key stakeholders, serving as the primary point of contact for their solar EPC needs. Identify client requirements, understand their business objectives, and provide tailored solutions to meet their specific project goals and expectations. Proposal Development and Sales Presentations: Prepare and deliver compelling sales proposals, presentations, and pitches to prospective clients, highlighting the value proposition of our solar EPC services. column2: As the Customer Relationship Manager (CRM) for a Corrugation Plant in India, your primary responsibility will be to develop and maintain strong relationships with customers, ensuring their satisfaction and loyalty. You will serve as the main point of contact for customers, handling their inquiries, addressing concerns, and coordinating with internal teams to deliver exceptional service. Your role will involve managing customer accounts, driving customer retention, and identifying opportunities for business growth. Key Responsibilities: 1. Customer Relationship Management:  Build and maintain strong relationships with customers, understanding their needs, and providing timely assistance and support.  Serve as the main point of contact for customer inquiries, concerns, and requests, ensuring prompt and accurate resolution.  Proactively communicate with customers to keep them updated on order status, delivery schedules, and any relevant information.  Develop a deep understanding of customer requirements, preferences, and expectations to anticipate their needs and provide tailored solutions.  Conduct regular customer satisfaction surveys, analyze feedback, and implement measures to enhance customer experience. 2. Account Management:  Manage a portfolio of customer accounts, ensuring their needs are met and their expectations are exceeded.  Monitor customer orders, contracts, and agreements, ensuring adherence to terms and conditions.  Collaborate with sales and production teams to ensure timely order processing, production scheduling, and delivery.  Prepare and present regular reports on customer account performance, sales forecasts, and customer-related metrics. 3. Customer Service Excellence:  Handle customer complaints, resolve issues, and escalate complex problems to the appropriate internal departments for resolution.  Implement and maintain customer service standards and best practices within the organization.  Continuously improve customer service processes, systems, and workflows to enhance efficiency and customer satisfaction. 4. Market Intelligence and Competitor Analysis:  Stay updated with industry trends, market dynamics, and competitive landscape in the corrugation industry.  Monitor customer feedback, market trends, and emerging customer needs to identify business opportunities and areas for improvement. Qualifications and Skills:  Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field. A Master's degree or MBA is a plus.  Proven experience (4-8 years) in customer relationship management, preferably in the manufacturing industry.  Excellent interpersonal and communication skills, with the ability to build rapport and establish trust with customers.  Strong problem-solving and conflict resolution abilities to handle customer concerns effectively.  Sound knowledge of customer service principles, practices.  Ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams and manage multiple priorities.
column11: Relationship Management, Customer relationship management, Customer service, Market Intelligence, CRM, Communication
