column2: Sales Executive -Rent a Car Position Overview :  We are seeking a dynamic and motivated Rent a Car Sales Executive to join our team at [Rent a Car Business Name]. The Sales Executive will play a pivotal role in driving sales growth and promoting our rental car services to individual and corporate clients. This position requires a proactive individual with excellent communication skills, a strong sales acumen, and a passion for delivering exceptional customer service. Responsibilities: 1. Proactively identify and generate sales opportunities through various channels, including cold calling, networking, and referrals, to achieve individual and team sales targets. 2. Develop and maintain relationships with corporate clients, travel agencies, hotels, and other potential business partners to expand the customer base and drive revenue growth. 3. Conduct thorough needs assessments and consultations with clients to understand their requirements and recommend suitable rental car solutions to meet their needs. 4. Prepare and present persuasive sales proposals and quotations to prospective clients, highlighting the unique features and benefits of our rental car services. 5. Negotiate terms and pricing agreements with clients, following company policies and procedures, to secure profitable contracts and maximize revenue opportunities. 6. Coordinate with the operations team to ensure timely and efficient delivery of rental cars to clients, providing ongoing support and assistance throughout the rental period. 7. Maintain accurate records of sales activities, customer interactions, and sales pipeline information in the CRM system, ensuring data integrity and timely reporting. 8. Stay informed about industry trends, competitor activities, and market developments to identify new business opportunities and stay ahead of the competition. 9. Attend industry events, trade shows, and networking functions to promote the company's brand and rental car services and build relationships with potential clients. 10. Uphold the highest standards of customer service, addressing client inquiries, resolving issues or complaints promptly, and ensuring a positive customer experience at all times. Qualifications: 1. Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field preferred. 2. Proven track record of success in sales, preferably in the automotive, rental car, or hospitality industry. 3. Strong sales acumen with the ability to identify sales opportunities, overcome objections, and close deals effectively. 4. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build rapport and establish trust with clients and colleagues. 5. Self-motivated and results-oriented, with a proactive approach to achieving sales targets and exceeding customer expectations. 6. Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced, customer-focused environment. 7. Knowledge of local market trends and customer preferences is a plus.

column2: We are currently seeking a driven and experienced International Sales Executive with 1 to 3 years of experience in US cold calling, particularly in IT sales or NetSuite sales, to join our team for the night shift. As an integral part of our sales force, you will be responsible for driving revenue growth and expanding our client base in international markets during non-traditional business hours. Responsibilities: Conduct US cold calls during the night shift to identify and qualify leads in the IT or NetSuite market segment. Build and nurture strong relationships with potential clients, understanding their unique business needs, and positioning our IT solutions or NetSuite offerings effectively. Develop and implement strategic sales plans to meet or exceed sales targets and objectives. Collaborate closely with the marketing team to execute targeted campaigns and initiatives aimed at generating leads and driving sales. Negotiate contracts, pricing agreements, and terms with clients, ensuring alignment with their expectations and our company's goals. Stay abreast of industry trends, competitor activities, and market developments to identify new opportunities and stay ahead of the competition. Provide regular reports and updates on sales activities, forecasts, and performance metrics to management and relevant stakeholders. Requirements: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Computer Science, or a related field. Proven track record of 1 to 3 years of experience in US cold calling, specifically in IT sales or NetSuite sales. Strong understanding of IT solutions or NetSuite ERP Tool, with the ability to effectively communicate technical concepts to non-technical audiences. Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build rapport and trust with clients. Proficiency in MS Office and CRM software. Flexibility to work the night shift, covering different time zones, to accommodate our international clients' needs. Willingness to occasionally travel for client meetings and industry events, as required. Benefits: Competitive salary with night shift differential and performance-based incentives. Opportunities for career advancement and growth. One complimentary meal provided during the night shift, ensuring our employees are energized and focused during their work hours. Transportation benefits include cab service provided for employees working the night shift, ensuring safe and convenient travel to and from the workplace. Contact Details:  Lakshmi Priya - HR 9176687974 hr@arcticturns.com

column2: ## This position is based in Bangalore. ## work from the office ## US Shift (Night) ## ## Immediate Joiners Preferred## Job title:  Inside Sales Executive Position Overview:  As an  Inside Sales Executive ??focusing on the US market, you will play a pivotal role in driving revenue growth by engaging with potential clients and effectively communicating the value of our software solutions. Your responsibilities will include proactive outreach, lead qualification, and collaboration with cross-functional teams to deliver tailored business solutions. Job Description & Duties: Conduct outbound prospecting activities to identify and qualify leads within the US automotive market. Utilize various channels, including phone calls, emails, and social media, to initiate sales conversations and build relationships with prospective clients. Understand customer needs and pain points to position our software solutions as essential tools for their business success. Collaborate with the sales and marketing teams to develop targeted outreach strategies and campaigns. Maintain accurate records of sales activities and customer interactions using CRM software. Meet or exceed monthly and quarterly sales targets and KPIs. Stay updated on industry trends, market dynamics, and competitor offerings to maintain a competitive edge. Required Skills: Good at Verbal & Written English communication skills. Proven success in inside sales or a similar role, preferably within the US market. Cold calling experience with US / Canada region is a must. Well-versed in Outreach Campaign management via different channels - email, cold calling, LinkedIn, Text messaging, etc. for lead generation & prospecting. Skilled in - Lead Qualification (BANT), Objection Handling, Negotiation, Appointment Setting, Pain Funnel Discussion, Product Demo walkthrough, Pain Funnel &Pricing Discussion Active listening and articulating skills and questioning abilities. Highly motivated self-starter with a results-driven mindset and a passion for exceeding targets. Experience with CRM software (e.g., Salesforce, HubSpot) and proficiency in Microsoft Office suite. Good at resolving work related instances requiring Logical reasoning & mental ability skills and ability to tweak consultative sales approach post due diligence of customer?? perception management. Qualification: Work Experience: ?3 ??5 yrs of relevant work experience. IT Experience: Computer Skill using Word, Excel & PPT. Academic / Other Qualifications:? Any Graduate with relevant work experience. Benefits: Competitive salary and performance-based incentives. Comprehensive health insurance and wellness programs. Continuous learning and professional development opportunities. Opportunity for career advancement within a rapidly growing company.

column2: The position of International Customer Solutions Representative will report to the Customer Solutions Manager at Boyd Corporation. This tactical position will be tasked with various duties that drive increasing value and profitability of the global organization. Above all, the ICSR supports our inside sales team across the globe as well as our customer service model by providing an exceptional, best-in-class customer experience. The ICSR will be expected to maintain quality relationships with current customers (internal & external), keep communication flowing to the correct sources, and perform various order entry functions.    Location : Chennai Shift : 11:00 AM to 8:00 PM   Responsibilities:   Order entry & contract review  using multiple ERP systems, customer orders will need to be reviewed for accuracy, then entered into the site-specific order entry system. If errors are identified, the ICSR should work with the US customer service rep to confirm with customer and correct.  PO confirmation -  ICSRs should provide order and PO confirmation back to the customer  Rescheduling pull ins/ push outs -  Coordinating with US CSR team and customers, the ICSR should assist with customer requests on pulling in /pushing out orders per Boyd policies, ensuring communication is a closed loop with facility scheduling.  ECNs & CNCRs -  Assisting with logging various Engineering Change Order requests for new/update part versions or redline changes to ensure compliance with the customer and ISO standards. Completing Customer Non-Confirming Reports to assist the sales & quality team with logging customer issues with product.  Shipping & tracking information -  Providing the shipping and tracking information for customer orders & deliveries by researching order in various ERP systems. Communicating with US sales team or customer directly.  Documentation -  Assist in providing any documentation the customer or sales requires (acquisition of product/material certificates, invoices, sales orders, packing lists, etc.).  Processing RFQ -  Assisting sales in logging request for quotes from our customers ensuring all data required is complete and accurate, and coordinating additional information from sales or the customer if required.  Processing NRSUs -  As part of the sales order entry process, you will be required to assist with new part introductions and their associated Non-Recurring Set Up charges (associated one time charges, NRSU). Following the specific procedure for each type of NRSU, and confirming the proper departments are notified at certain steps within the process.  Answer Customers' queries and concerns within the given time frame Additional duties as assigned   SKILLS and Qualification:    The requirements listed below are representative of the knowledge, skill, and/or ability required. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.  Strong background working in a customer-facing environment and driving initiatives to improve customer satisfaction in a highly technical environment.  Ability to learn fast, shift directions even faster and work collaboratively on a highly effective team.  Experienced in handling team Extremely organized with the ability to manage multiple customers remotely  Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English language  Good with Quality customer service and resolving all complaints received  Familiar with ERP system, technology and Data  Flexible to work in Shift timings  EDUCATION/EXPERIENCE   Any Bachelor degree and Minimum 4 years of related experience in the similar job role.   LANGUAGE SKILLS   Should respond to common inquiries from customers & inside sales teammates from US. Ability to write memos and emails that conform to prescribed style and format. Must be able to effectively present information to top management, sales groups, engineers, and/or customers.  MUST READ, WRITE AND SPEAK FLUENT ENGLISH.  MATHEMATICAL SKILLS   Ability to calculate figures and amounts such as discounts, interest, proportions, percentages, area, circumference, and volume.  REASONING ABILITY   Ability to solve practical problems and deal with a variety of concrete variables in situations where only limited standardization exists. Ability to interpret a variety of instructions furnished in written, oral, diagram, or schedule form.

column2: JOB DESCRIPTION SALES EXECUTIVE Job Type: Full Time/Permanent Experience: 1 - 2years Salary: 2.5LPA 3.5LPA JOB BRIEF We are 30 years old furniture manufacturing company dealing with commercial projects based in Coimbatore. We are looking for a self-motivated sales executive who can work alongside a number of specialists at our company.  The Sales and Inquiry Executive plays a vital role in driving revenue growth by effectively managing customer inquiries, generating leads, and converting them into sales opportunities. This role involves providing excellent customer service, understanding client needs, and promoting products or services to meet those needs. The Sales and Inquiry Executive serves as a primary point of contact for potential customers, guiding them through the sales process from initial inquiry to purchase. KEY RESPONSIBILITIES: Respond promptly to customer inquiries via phone, email, or in-person visits, providing accurate information about products or services and addressing any questions or concerns. Proactively identify and pursue sales leads through various channels, including cold calling, networking events, referrals, and online research, to expand the customer base and increase sales opportunities. Present product features, benefits, and pricing options to potential customers in a compelling and persuasive manner, emphasizing value propositions and addressing objections to close sales. Build and maintain strong relationships with existing and potential customers, understanding their unique needs and preferences to provide tailored solutions and enhance customer satisfaction and loyalty. Follow up with leads and prospects at various stages of the sales cycle to provide additional information, address concerns, and facilitate decision-making, ensuring timely and effective communication throughout the process. Maintain accurate records of customer interactions, inquiries, and sales activities in CRM systems or databases, tracking leads, opportunities, and sales performance metrics to support strategic decision-making and forecasting. Stay informed about industry trends, competitor offerings, and customer preferences through market research and analysis, providing insights and recommendations to support sales and marketing strategies. Coordinate with internal teams, including marketing, product development, and customer support, to align sales efforts with organizational goals, share customer feedback, and ensure a seamless customer experience. QUALIFICATIONS AND SKILLS: Bachelor's degree in business administration, marketing, or a related field;  Proven experience in sales, customer service, or a related field, with a track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets and customer satisfaction goals. Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written, with the ability to articulate product features and benefits persuasively and build rapport with customers. Proficiency in using Microsoft Office suite, and other sales and productivity tools to manage leads, track sales activities, and generate reports. Results-oriented mindset with a focus on driving revenue growth, maximizing sales opportunities, and delivering exceptional customer experiences. Adaptability and resilience to thrive in a dynamic and fast-paced sales environment, with the ability to multitask, prioritize tasks, and manage time effectively.   * Interested candidates send your updated CV through Mail on hr@zenfurniture.in  CONTACT PERSON HR  9080506567   ABOUT US:  https://www.zenfurniture.in/

column2: Job Title: Business Development Executive/Manager (US Staffing) Location:  Noida Company:  Hirex Canam Pvt ltd. About Us:   HireX is the North American Solution Provider for staffing, recruitment and HR Services. A key player in the recruitment and staffing market, HireX provides unrivaled expertise in matching North America's top talent with the most sought after North American employers. With our insightful knowledge of local markets, employment trends and global network of recruitment experts, we are shaping the North American world of work.  Job Description:  We are seeking a dynamic and results-driven Business Development Executive/Manager with experience in the US staffing industry to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for generating new business opportunities, building strong client relationships, and driving revenue growth. Roles and Responsibilities: Client Acquisition:  Identify and prospect new clients in the US market through various channels such as cold calling, networking, referrals, and attending industry events. Sales Pipeline Management:  Manage the entire sales process from lead generation to contract negotiation and closure, ensuring a steady flow of opportunities and timely conversion. Client Relationship Management:  Develop and maintain strong relationships with existing clients, understand their staffing needs, and provide customized solutions to meet their requirements. Market Research:  Conduct thorough market research to identify potential clients, understand industry trends, and analyze competitor strategies to stay ahead in the market. Proposal Development:  Prepare and deliver compelling sales presentations, proposals, and pitches to effectively communicate the value proposition of our staffing solutions. Revenue Generation:  Meet or exceed sales targets by consistently achieving revenue goals and contributing to the overall growth and success of the organization. Collaboration:  Work closely with internal recruiting teams to ensure the timely delivery of quality candidates to clients and maintain high levels of customer satisfaction. Performance Tracking:  Track sales performance metrics, prepare regular reports, and provide updates to management on sales activities, client relationships, and market insights. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or related field. Minimum 1.5 years of experience in business development or sales roles within the US staffing industry. Proven track record of achieving sales targets and driving revenue growth. Strong understanding of staffing and recruitment processes, industry trends, and client needs. Excellent communication, negotiation, and presentation skills. Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced, dynamic environment. How to Apply:  Please submit your resume and cover letter detailing your relevant experience and why you are the ideal candidate for this position to akshay@hirexcorp.com or 8299109382.

column2: We are seeking a detail-oriented and proactive Tendering Executive to join our organization. The Tendering Executive will be responsible for managing the end-to-end tender process, including identifying opportunities, preparing and submitting bids, and coordinating with internal teams to ensure timely and accurate completion of tender documents. This role requires excellent communication skills, strong analytical abilities, and a thorough understanding of tendering procedures.     Responsibilities:       Tender Identification: Monitor and research tender opportunities through various sources, including government portals, industry websites, and publications. Identify relevant tenders that align with the company?? capabilities and objectives.     Bid Preparation: Prepare and compile tender documents in accordance with the requirements outlined in the tender documents. This includes reviewing and analyzing tender specifications, preparing technical and commercial proposals, and ensuring compliance with all necessary documentation.     Coordinate Internal Teams: Collaborate with internal stakeholders, such as sales, engineering, legal, and finance departments, to gather the required information and resources for tender submissions. Ensure effective communication and coordination to meet deadlines and address any queries or concerns.     Documentation Management: Maintain an organized and up-to-date database of tender documents, including past tenders, templates, and supporting materials. Ensure accuracy and completeness of all documentation for future reference and audits.     Compliance and Quality Assurance: Ensure all tender submissions comply with legal and regulatory requirements, as well as company policies and procedures. Perform quality checks on tender documents to minimize errors and maximize chances of success.     Competitive Analysis: Conduct market research and competitor analysis to understand industry trends, pricing strategies, and customer requirements. Utilize this information to enhance the company?? competitive position in tender submissions.     Contract Review: Assist in reviewing and negotiating contract terms and conditions for successful tenders. Collaborate with the legal team to ensure contracts are aligned with company policies and adequately mitigate risks.     Relationship Management: Build and maintain relationships with existing and potential clients, industry partners, and government agencies involved in the tendering process. Attend pre-bid meetings, site visits, and industry events to foster business opportunities.       Requirements:       Bachelor?? degree in business administration, Commerce, Engineering, or a related field.     Proven experience in tendering, bid management, or procurement.     Familiarity with tendering procedures, government regulations, and contract management.     Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with attention to detail.     Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.     Proficiency in using MS Office applications and tendering software/tools.     Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a team environment.     Knowledge of the industry or sector in which the company operates is a plus.     Effective time management and organizational skills to meet deadlines.     Experience in preparing tenders for government contracts is desirable.

Key Responsibilities: Order Processing:  Receive, review, and process sales orders accurately and in a timely manner using the designated systems and software. Documentation:  Maintain comprehensive and up-to-date sales order documentation, including order forms, invoices, shipping documents, and customer records. Communication:  Serve as the primary point of contact for order-related inquiries, liaising between sales representatives, customers, and internal departments to resolve issues and provide updates on order status. Inventory Management:  Collaborate with inventory control teams to monitor stock levels, track product availability, and ensure timely delivery of orders. Quality Assurance:  Conduct thorough quality checks on sales orders to ensure accuracy, completeness, and compliance with company policies and procedures. Customer Service:  Provide exceptional customer service by addressing inquiries, resolving complaints, and proactively communicating with customers regarding order updates and delivery schedules. Reporting:  Generate regular reports on sales order status, processing times, and key performance metrics to support decision-making and identify areas for improvement. Process Improvement:  Continuously evaluate and streamline the sales order process to enhance efficiency, minimize errors, and optimize customer satisfaction. Compliance:  Adhere to all relevant regulations, standards, and best practices governing sales order management, including data privacy and security requirements. Cross-Functional Collaboration:  Collaborate closely with sales teams, finance, shipping and logistics, and other departments to ensure alignment and coordination across the order fulfillment process. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in business administration, supply chain management, or a related field preferred. Proven experience in sales order administration, customer service, or a similar role, preferably in a manufacturing, distribution, or retail environment. Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written, with a customer-centric approach and the ability to interact professionally with diverse stakeholders. Strong attention to detail and accuracy, with the ability to multitask, prioritize workload, and meet tight deadlines in a fast-paced environment. Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret data, identify trends, and make data-driven decisions to improve processes and performance. Strong problem-solving skills and a proactive attitude towards resolving issues and implementing solutions. Knowledge of sales order management best practices, industry standards, and regulatory requirements. Ability to work independently with minimal supervision, as well as collaboratively within a team environment. Benefits: Competitive salary and benefits package Opportunities for career growth and advancement Dynamic and inclusive work environment Training and development programs Employee discounts and wellness initiatives

column2: Why join us? At Skyjumper, we are now the largest chain of trampoline parks across India, successfully running since 2017. In six years, we have expanded our presence to ten different cities within the country. Looking ahead, the company has ambitious plans for 10X profitable growth within the next 4 years. While on the path of profitable super-growth, we are committed to growing our people with us. We are also committed to our core value of an inclusive environment in which everyone is respected and treated fairly. column2: Job Description- Student Mentor The Student Mentor role involves multifaceted responsibilities focused on student support, retention strategies, communication, resource development, and data analysis. Responsibilities encompass personalized academic guidance, tailoring study plans to student needs, and monitoring progress. Strategies to foster student retention involve community engagement and proactive intervention for at-risk students. Effective communication with parents and teachers, organizing meetings, and acting as a liaison for productive discussions are vital. Curating educational resources, staying updated on educational trends, and conducting data analysis for performance improvement are key. Regular reporting on student progress and outcomes is crucial for management and stakeholders' insights Key Responsibilities: Student Support and Guidance: Provide one-on-one academic support to students, helping them understand complex concepts and improve their learning outcomes. Assess students' strengths and weaknesses and create personalized study plans to address their individual needs. Monitor and track students' progress, identify areas of improvement, and make necessary adjustments to their learning plans. Retention Strategies: Develop and implement strategies to enhance student retention rates by fostering a sense of belonging and engagement within the Vedantu learning community. Identify at-risk students and intervene proactively to address their challenges and concerns. Collaborate with the counseling and support teams to provide social and emotional support to students. Parent and Teacher Communication: Maintain open and effective communication with parents and teachers to ensure a holistic approach to student development. Organize parent-teacher conferences and meetings to discuss student progress and improvement plans. Act as a liaison between parents and teachers, addressing concerns and facilitating productive discussions. Resource Development: Curate and create educational resources, including study materials, practice exercises, and learning tools, to aid student learning. Stay up-to-date with the latest educational trends and methodologies to enhance the quality of mentorship. Data Analysis and Reporting: Collect and analyze data related to student performance and retention rates to identify trends and areas for improvement. Prepare regular reports on student progress, interventions, and outcomes for management and stakeholders. Qualifications: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Education, Psychology, or a related field. Previous experience in student mentoring, counseling, or educational support is preferred. Strong interpersonal and communication skills. Empathetic and patient with a genuine passion for helping students succeed. Ability to adapt to different learning styles and needs. Proficient in using educational technology and online learning platforms. APPLY ONLY : - SCIENCE BACKGROUND - Work From Home LANGUAGE -TAMIL  -TELUGU -HINDI

column1: Engineering Graduates For International Sales Process Role - US Client
column2: Location:  Bangalore Company Name:  SiliconMedia Publishing (http://siliconmediapublishing.com) Designation:  International Sales Process Executive Job Type:  Night shift, Monday to Friday, 8 Pm - 6 Am. Salary  : 3.5 to 5 lakh per annum + monthly performance incentives. Qualification:  Fresh Engineering Graduates (B.E./B.Tech any stream). SiliconMedia Publishing is on the lookout for sharp, innovative engineering minds ready to step into the world of international sales. We are seeking individuals who can blend their reasoning acumen with exceptional communication skills to engage with our prestigious US clientele.  Responsibilities:  Utilize strong comprehension skills to accurately understand and address client needs and questions. Engage with marketing, editorial, and operations teams to streamline internal processes. Collaborate with our inbound sales team to manage client needs effectively. Craft persuasive responses to client inquiries, supporting our sales efforts. Manage project requirements efficiently, ensuring all tasks are completed correctly and on time. Adhere to quality requirements, achieve targets/volumes in given TAT(Turn around time). Requirements Excellent command of written formal English to effectively communicate with clients. Craft clear and structured responses to client inquiries, ensuring a seamless flow and professional tone. Ability to quickly learn and understand what different companies do and what products they offer by researching online/google.  Benefits:  Enjoy the stability of a fixed salary with the added excitement of variable monthly incentives. Dedicated and hardworking team members can see their earnings go up to 70,000 - 80,000 per month within just 6 to 9 months. We pride ourselves on internal promotions. Show exemplary communication skills, and you could be leading your own team as a sales lead, with a total compensation package exceeding 12 lakh per year, in as little as one year after joining.  While most IT firms in Bangalore require engineers to have over 5 years of experience before considering a promotion to Business Development, we offer a unique advantage. Join us and skip the queue! Embrace a dynamic and lucrative career path that not only values but also leverages your engineering expertise from day one. Your salary reflects your education, skills, and ability to learn quickly. While experience is not required, your smartness and performance will drive your earnings. Comprehensive health insurance plan for employees and family, available at the discounted corporate rate.  A significant portion of your pay comes from performance-based incentives, rewarding your achievements each month. Complimentary snacks and refreshments to keep you energized throughout the night shift.   Application Process:  Visit our office for a walk-in interview from Monday to Friday between 11 Am. and 5 Pm. Please bring a copy of your CV for the initial written assessment. Alternatively, you have the option to submit your CV via email. Upon receiving your CV, we will coordinate with you to schedule a time for the first-round written test. Our address SiliconMedia Publishing  No.124, 2nd Floor, Surya Chambers,South Block, Old Airport Main Road,  Murugeshpalya, Opp to ISRO, Bangalore - 560017. Contact No : 7406432636/ 08046441118.

column2: Your Key Responsibilities Pre-sales Sales support by preparation of sales strategy, market assessment, industry scan, opportunity maps, wallet sizing, target client list, cross-sell, etc. Track developments in the Securities Services industry, provide market intelligence, identify new-age opportunities, generate Ideas, and appraise the Sales/Business heads to support business growth Facilitate internal workshops to support lead generation, idea generation Liaising with other divisions within the bank to identify sales related best practices Sales Support (Live deals) Create presentations, sales material, pitch books, respond to Request for Proposals/Request for Information (RFP/RFI), under the guidance of the Sales/Business Heads within tight deadlines Analyze client and market information, draw customized solutions, define DBs value proposition, highlight DBs competitive advantage and showcase new initiatives withing the sales material/presentations Coordinate with subject matter experts within the bank (Audit, Financial Crime, ESG, Risk, legal and compliance, Forex, KYC etc.) to collect and present key information required for the sales pitch Provide logistics support (ensure set-up of communication tools, prepare due diligence checklists, suggest ideas to improve customer experience) to sales team during clients due diligence visit. Post sales Follow-up/track action items resulting from the sales meetings, client pitches Coordinate responses preparation to client clarifications Facilitate post-sales-deep-dive session to understand client feedback, lessons learnt, outline actionable initiatives, assign responsibilities & timelines, track progress Prepare Sales related MIS support in terms of win/loss analysis, target vs actual performance, sales pipeline, cross-sell, etc. Knowledge management Prepare a repository of sales material (presentation slides, content, past submissions, cover letter formats etc.) to achieve efficiency in sales efforts Maintenance of Sales Material i.e. validate accuracy and quality of information, presentably, adherence to internal marketing guidelines. Prepare talking points, white paper drafts, briefing memos for Global Head of Sales, as and when required. Your experience and skills: Desired background: Postgraduate with 2-5 years' experience in Financial Services Experience in working on Sales Support, Management Consulting, Advisory, CEOs office, Strategy and implementation would be preferred Excellent power point presentation preparation skills Proficiency in other MS office tools such as Excel, Word Excellent verbal and written communication skills Experience in conducting and driving meetings with senior stakeholders (CXOs level) and global teams A willingness to be flexible to meet changing work priorities and tasks, with an ability to manage a high workload, work independently and plan your work to meet deadlines An eye for detail, identify data discrepancies and exceptional problem-solving skills

column2: Role & responsibilities    The Market Research Analyst will be gathering and analyzing data to identify market trends, assess competitive landscapes, and inform strategic decision-making. This position offers an exciting opportunity to contribute to the growth and success of Hydrolabs a startup environmental laboratory at the forefront of the industry.   Roles and Responsibilities (not exhaustive)   Conduct market research to identify emerging trends, customer needs, and competitive dynamics in the environmental science industry. Visit Industries to understand their requirements Visit Food Chains, QSRs, Hotels to understand their testing requirements Collect and analyze data on market size, growth potential, and key drivers influencing demand for environmental testing and consulting services. Collaborate with teams in Ahmedabad and Bangalore to develop insights and recommendations for marketing strategies, product development, and business expansion initiatives. Prepare reports, presentations, and dashboards to communicate research findings and actionable insights  Assist in the development of marketing materials, including brochures, website content, and social media posts, to promote the laboratory's services and capabilities. Support business development efforts by identifying potential clients, conducting competitive analyses, and contributing to proposal development processes. Preferred candidate profile     Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business Administration, Environmental Science, or a related field. Anyone pursuing degree in these fields are also welcome to apply Strong analytical skills with proficiency in data analysis tools and techniques. Good written and verbal communication skills Detail oriented approach with a commitment to accuracy and quality in research and analysis. Proficiency in Microsoft Office suite and experience with market research software and databases. This is a full-time position based in Mumbai, offering competitive compensation and opportunities for professional growth and development. If you are passionate about market research and environmental sustainability, we encourage you to apply and join our young team!

column2: Overview of Position:  The Sales Operations Associate will be good at operations and partner with our sales team to help optimize operational processes and ensure seamless integration around systems, tools, and technology. You will build and execute core operational processes, such as reporting, and ongoing business operations management. You will also take on of new sales enhancement processes, platforms, and tools.  What youll do:   Collaborate with cross-functional stakeholders on strategic operational projects designed to increase sales and revenue  Develop analytical frameworks, and techniques to plan and communicate short- and long-term needs.  Spearhead territory alignment, market and buyer segmentation, account scoring, lead routing, quota setting, sales forecasting, and commission planning Track data and maintain our reporting processes, spanning key sales pipeline, productivity metrics, and forecasting Conduct strategic market insights including competitive landscape analysis to help formulate go to market plans  Continuously refine and improve sales processes and system implementations  Contribute towards the annual and quarterly planning processes for sales in consultation with the Sales Leader, which include the development of the business plan, operating model, customer segmentation and resource allocation  Who were looking for:  3+ years of relevant work experience in business operations  Experience working across multiple business units, influencing and collaborating with others to successfully implement programs  Expertise in analytics, excel and knowledge of CRM & Sales Process is essential  Experience in the health and wellness industry preferred ??Working knowledge of sales systems and tools  Analytical thinker and structured problem solver ??Familiarity with tech or start-up environment. Good negotiation skills, competitive and confident approach  Why RoundGlass:  RoundGlass was built on the vision that wellbeing should be at the very center of our life journey. We are not only reimagining how the world experiences wellbeing, but how companies (like our own) support the wellbeing of their people. Were a group of talented, socially conscious, gritty, innovators using technology and human energy to create a vibrant wellness ecosystem. Together, weve built an amazing community and we are always looking for people who share our passion. We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status. RoundGlass will provide reasonable accommodation to individuals with disabilities who need assistance applying for a job.

column2: Role: Startup Coordinator   Job Location:  Bangalore Job Type:  Full time & Permanent    About the role:  This role involves combining technical knowledge with sales skills to promote products and services related to 3DEXPERIENCE & SOLIDWORKS solution for startups. This role involves travel to meet prospects at their location and face-to-face meetings at client premises. In this role you will have to monitor the implementation status of the startup program and provide periodic feedback to the internal team and explore possibilities of program expansion and continuity.    Job Description   Getting trained on 3DEXPERIENCE startup program and individual identification, qualifying, and converting as a startups customer.  Stay up to date with new company products and industry trends in startups.  Attend conferences, lectures, seminars, and workshops to improve skills and knowledge related to startups.  Conduct market research and gather details of new startups on a daily basis and convert as customers.  Understand and simplify technical terms and utilize them during discussion with startups prospects and should be able to convince the prospect.  Maintain strong professional relationships with existing clients and expand startup solutions as and when they are required.  Update orders and sales, negotiate contract terms, and ensure smooth order processing.    Requirements:   Education : Bachelors degree  Sales Experience : Prior experience in sales would be advantageous / Freshers can also apply.  Skills :  Excellent customer service, analytical, and interpersonal skills.  Strong organizational, research, and multitasking abilities.  Effective negotiation and problem-solving skills.  Written and oral communication skills essential    Key Performance Indicators:   Startups to be identified on a monthly basis.  Starups registered for the startups program.  Incubators registered for startups program.  Renewals of the startups program  Participation and promotion of startups program in startups events  Revenue from startups program customers  Startups customer testimonial and case studies  Conducting startup programs to improve customer satisfaction.

column2: Job Description:  Job Title:-  Internship (Marketing & Sales) Company:-  Ashwin Sheth Group Location About Us:-  Established in 1986, Ashwin Sheth Group is one of the leading real estate developers in the country, with an identity rooted in unique designs infused with contemporary thinking. Since its inception, the Group has delivered some of the finest Residential, IT, Commercial, and Retail projects in India and abroad, through resourceful planning, unwavering focus on quality, and customer-oriented designs, We are committed to transforming urban landscapes through innovative and sustainable development solutions. As we continue to expand our portfolio, we are seeking a dynamic and experienced Business Development professional to join our team.   Roles and Responsibilities: Act as a key liaison between the marketing and sales teams and CP leads to ensure strategies are well aligned and goals are met. Support in developing marketing strategies and initiatives that directly contribute to the sourcing objectives within the real estate market. Coordinate and actively participate in field activities, including property visits, supplier meetings, and industry conferences, to build relationships and gather market insights. Assist CP leads in conducting comprehensive market research to identify potential vendors and trends impacting the real estate sector. Prepare detailed reports and presentations for internal stakeholders, providing insights gathered from field activities and ongoing market research. Manage scheduling, logistical planning, and coordination for meetings with suppliers and internal team members. Document the effectiveness of marketing campaigns and field activities, providing recommendations for improvements. Requirements: Currently pursuing or a recent graduate of a Bachelors or Masters degree program in Marketing, or related fields. Strong interest and understanding of the real estate market and its dynamics. Excellent communication skills, with the ability to engage effectively with internal teams and external partners. Willingness to travel and engage in field activities, demonstrating initiative and commitment. Organizational prowess with multitasking abilities to handle various projects at once. Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite, with a focus on Excel and PowerPoint; familiarity with real estate management software is a plus. Analytical skills with a keen eye for detail. Benefits: Competitive stipend plus travel incentives. Hands-on experience in real estate marketing and sales, with a specific focus on sourcing. Opportunities to work directly with experienced professionals and CP leads. Exposure to real-world challenges and solutions in the fast-paced real estate sector. Potential for full-time employment based on performance and business needs.

column2: 1 Data Management:             Maintain accurate records and databases of large corporate clients across PAN India, tracking repayments, fees, disbursement status, and sanction terms and conditions.             2 Financial Details:              Manage put-call/interest reset details and perform book comparisons to ensure data accuracy and consistency.             3 Reporting:              Collaborate with regional teams to prepare monthly pipeline reports, tracking the pipelines progress on a daily basis, and resolving TDS-related queries.             4 Post-Disbursement Activities:              Assist in post-disbursement activities, including collections, deferral management, and post-disbursement documentation (PDD).             5 Query Resolution:              Address SOA (Statement of Accounts) related queries and coordinate with the operations department to resolve issues related to overdue charges, ARN (Acknowledgment Receipt Number), and security perfection.             6 Deferral MIS:              Collect deferral MIS from the CAD (Credit Administration) Team and coordinate with regions for closure.             7 Collections Monitoring:              Keep track of collections for all corporate cases and promptly inform Relationship Managers (RMs) about any overdue accounts on a daily basis.         Prepare visit reports, opportunity reports, lead reports, and region-wise data on a weekly basis. Additionally, create PPT presentations for review with the Managing Director (MD).                 Qualifications -           Minimum Degree: Graduate in any discipline.

column2: Associate Sales Operations Analyst   Mumbai   About Argus:     Argus is an independent media organisation with 1,300 staff. It is headquartered in London and has 29 offices in the worlds principal commodity trading and production centres. Argus produces price assessments and analysis of international energy and other commodity markets and offers bespoke consulting services and industry-leading conferences. Companies in 140 countries around the world use Argus data to index physical trade and as benchmarks in financial derivative markets as well as for analysis and planning purposes.       Argus was founded in 1970 and is a privately held UK-registered company. It is owned by employee shareholders, global growth equity firm General Atlantic. Argus Media is committed to ensuring career and personal growth for all its staff and provides extensive training and career development opportunities, as well as participation in employee-led initiatives, including a womens network. Our core values are Excellence, Integrity, Partnership and Inclusivity.         Job Purpose:   This is an exciting role which reports into the VP, Sales Operations and is responsible for supporting Strategic Partnership team and Sales Operations globally. You will be a part of a talented team that strive to support, identify growth opportunities, and improve processes across the sales and Marketing function globally.      Key responsibilities:   Completing scheduled reporting deadlines. Maintain data completeness and data accuracy of key client data in CRM. Engage with internal stakeholders for data needs and analysis. Improve data quality and add value to internal sales database through data enrichment project. Support Go-To-Market and sales territory planning process.   Skills and experience:     A bachelors degree in business, accounting, finance, or a similar discipline is required. Relevant working experience (2+ years) with Sales Operations, Business Analyst, and Data Analyst roles. Intermediate to advanced Excel skills are needed to manage and analyse large data sets. Ability to meet deadlines and prioritise workloads with minimal supervision. Comfortable working in a fast-paced, dynamic, and constantly evolving environment Pay attention to detail and be able to maintain high accuracy on data reporting. Strong interpersonal skills with the ability to establish trust and credibility with key stakeholders. Familiarity with CRM tools and CRM end-to-end processes. Knowledge of business intelligence tools would be an added advantage.     Whats in it for you:     Competitive salary and company bonus scheme Flexible Working Model Group healthcare scheme 18 days annual leave 8 days casual leave Extensive internal and external training     Hours:   Monday through Friday, 8.00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m.         For more details about the company and to apply please make sure you send your CV and cover letter via our website:   www.argusmedia.com/en/careers/open-positions     By submitting your job application, you automatically acknowledge and consent to the collection, use and/or disclosure of your personal data to the Company. Argus is an equal opportunity employer. We welcome and encourage diversity in the workplace regardless of race, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability or veteran status.

column2: Sales & Service engineer Job Summary: We are seeking a dynamic and motivated individual to join our team as a Sales and Service Engineer. This role involves a combination of technical expertise, customer engagement, and sales acumen. The Sales and Service Engineer will be responsible for promoting and selling our products and services, as well as providing technical support and assistance to customers. This position requires excellent communication skills, a strong technical background, and the ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment. Responsibilities: 1. Develop and implement sales strategies to achieve sales targets and expand customer base. 2. Identify potential customers and market opportunities through market research and networking. 3. Build and maintain strong relationships with new and existing customers. 4. Provide technical support and assistance to customers, including product demonstrations and installation. 5. troubleshooting, and training. 6. Prepare Service reports, maintain records, and generate feedback for the same 7. Collaborate with internal teams to ensure customer needs are met and inquiries are resolved promptly. 8. Stay updated on industry trends, market developments, and competitor activities. 9. Participate in trade shows, conferences, and other marketing events to promote products and services. 10. Prepare sales reports, forecasts, and budgets as required. 11. Continuously strive to improve product knowledge, technical skills, and sales techniques. Requirements: 1. A diploma or bachelor's degree in Engineering or related field. 2. Proven experience in technical sales or a similar role. 3. Strong understanding of technical products and services, preferably in [insert relevant industry]. 4. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. 5. Ability to multitask and prioritize tasks effectively. 6. Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail. 7. Ability to work independently and as part of a team. 8. Willingness to travel as required. 9. Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite and CRM software. 10. A valid driver's license. Benefits: 1. Competitive salary and commission structure. 2. Paid time off and holidays. 3. Opportunities for professional development and advancement.

column2: Role & responsibilities     Greet and welcome customers as they enter the showroom, creating a friendly and inviting atmosphere. Proficient in using computer systems and software for customer record management and communication. Strong problem-solving abilities and the capacity to handle customer complaints with patience and empathy. Ability to work in a fast-paced environment, managing multiple customer interactions simultaneously. Positive and friendly attitude, with a focus on providing exceptional customer service. Ability to work flexible hours, including weekends and holidays, based on showroom operational needs. Fluency in local languages and proficiency in English is preferred. Knowledge of showroom operations, products, and retail processes is a plus.

column1: Costing and Sales Support - Infrastructure Pumping Systems
column2: Job Title: Costing and Sales Support - Infrastructure Pumping Systems Industry Focus:  Pumping Solutions / Infrastructure / Civil Engineering  Work Arrangement: Full Time Remote Position Career Path:  Explore a journey of long-term possibilities. Location : Company based in NSW Australia (Remote  Work from Home) Work Hours:  3:30 am to 12:30 pm IST (8:00 am to 5:00 pm AEST - Australian Time) Work Schedule:  Monday to Friday. About SKILL HUB: Unleash Your Potential with Skill Hub: Your Gateway to Global Career Growth. At Skill Hub, we're more than just a staffing solutions provider; we are a global leader in managing offshore teams in India. We prioritize your well-being as much as your career growth. Enjoy the flexibility of remote work and a standard Monday to Friday schedule, allowing a work-life balance. Skill Hub is where your career takes flight. Client Company Overview: The candidate will be working for our Australian-based client company, a renowned leader in providing Quality Pumping Solutions with over 45 years of industry expertise. The company designs and supplies custom water and sewer pump stations across ACT, NSW, and Queensland. They offer tailored consultations and a wide range of pump solutions, including wastewater pump station, filtration, rainwater harvesting, stormwater management, and more. The candidate will collaborate closely with the design and infrastructure team and report directly to the Sales Manager. Job   Profile: Infrastructure Pumping Systems Design and Costing 1) Pumping System Design and Report Preparation: Thoroughly review documentation received from company's clients including Pumps  specifications, plans & drawings , and relevant standards to ensure accuracy and compliance. Proficient in  pump selection methodologies , considering factors such as flow rates, pressure requirements, fluid properties, and so on. Utilize company's  online pump selecting programs/software  to select correct pump for the project. Utilize companys specific  Design tools,  such as Excel spreadsheets and engineering expertise to create Pump Station requirements in detail. Conduct thorough analysis of  hydraulic systems , including pumps, piping, valves, level sensors, and so on, to design the Pumping System. Adhere to relevant Industry standards and regulations, conducting thorough  checks to ensure design compliance  and quality. Prepare necessary reports for presentation to both the sales team and their clients. Work closely with Pump Station Designing and Drafting team to develop proposals and presentations aligning with the company's client specifications and project deadlines.  Respond promptly to companys client requests, maintaining clear and professional communication at all the time. 2) Project Estimating, Costing and Procurement: Develop accurate  project estimation and costings  based on developed designs, analyzing specifications, adhering to Company's templates and guidelines.  Prepare  product requirements  based on design specifications for submitting to suppliers. Collaborate with suppliers  to obtain proposals and prepare project estimates, ensuring adherence to budgetary requirements. 3) Sales Presentation Preparation: Prepare compelling  project sales presentation  based on Companys templates and incorporate relevant project details. Prepare detailed  customer proposals  using Companys templates to support the sales team. Collaborate closely with the sales team  to analyze information provided by companys clients. 4)   Project Folder Organization: Prepare  project job folders  with attention to detail, compiling and organizing relevant information received from company's clients. Establish and maintain a comprehensive  folder structure , segregating and organizing relevant information for easy access and reference for the team. Essential Skills (Must Have): Exceptional written and verbal communication skills in English are mandatory, as the candidate is working with Australian company. Mechanical engineering candidates with an expertise of pumping systems; those with fundamental knowledge of civil engineering are preferred. Civil engineering candidates with an expertise of pumping system are also suitable.  A minimum of  2-4 years of experience with the pumps & pumping systems  industry, including understanding the design and selection of pumps is necessary, with an overall minimum of  5-10 years of professional experience . Proficiency in  interpreting Pumping System designs and preparing estimating and costing  to suit that design. Proficiency in  Office 365 tools  such as Microsoft Outlook, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and MS Teams is required for seamless communication and collaboration. Availability to work during Australian business hours is essential. Ability to learn and adapt to new systems. Desirable Skills: Fundamental knowledge of AutoCAD and Drafting will be an additional advantage. Exceptional organizational skills, including the ability to effectively manage multiple tasks and priorities, are desirable. Strong analytical and problem-solving capabilities are required for this role. Demonstrated ability to work autonomously and efficiently, with minimal supervision Benefits of working with SKILL HUB: Long-Term Opportunity:  Join a team committed to long-term career growth, providing stability and opportunities for advancement. Excellent Team Environment:  Thrive in a supportive and friendly work environment, where collaboration and teamwork are encouraged. Exciting Career Growth:  Elevate your career by collaborating with global teams, opening doors to endless possibilities for advancement and learning. Work from Anywhere:  Enjoy the flexibility of remote work, giving you the freedom to balance your professional and personal life seamlessly. All-in-One Setup : Gear up for success with all the essential tools provided, including desktops, laptops, headphones, and more, ensuring you're equipped for peak performance. Balanced Schedule:  Enjoy a standard five-day workweek, providing ample time to recharge and pursue personal interests outside of work.

column2: Services Sales Specialist Description - Job Summary This role is responsible for demonstrating extensive industry expertise and providing clients with insights that drive innovative and impactful solutions. The role applies consultative selling techniques to identify and nurture growth opportunities. The role manages customer relationships, margin recovery activities, and sales targets through effective pipeline management. Responsibilities Owns and coordinates account plans on larger strategic commercial account(s) and focuses on value and/or volume portfolio management and selling a range of the organizations offerings. Demonstrates advanced level of subject matter expertise and applies consultative-selling techniques to identify and advance opportunities resulting in profitable revenue growth for the organization. Engages with customers and internal functions to identify their requirements, aligns them with the organization's capabilities, and selects the appropriate supply chain accordingly. Manages account planning process through scheduled reviews and updates, identifies and builds growth opportunities, upselling, and cross-selling to the clients. Leads the contract renewal process, emphasizing the value proposition and securing long-term partnerships, and identifies expansion opportunities. Reviews and designs sales policies and strategies to meet sales targets and objectives for the assigned business segment; achieves and manages quarterly, half-yearly, and annual quota and/or margin. Collaborates with technical experts and specialists to tailor solutions to clients' specific needs. Implements margin recovery activities and strategies in full/ownership depending on account coverage. Updates opportunities in pipeline tools and processes, recommends, and implements pipeline management practices. Provides guidance and mentorship to junior account managers, sharing expertise and best practices. Education & Experience  Recommended Four-year or Graduate Degree in Sales, Marketing, Business Administration, or any other related discipline or commensurate work experience or demonstrated competence. Typically has 7-10 years of work experience, preferably in account management, tele sales, product specialty (computers, printers, servers, storage), or a related field. Preferred Certifications Certified Technology Sales Professional (CTSP) Knowledge & Skills Business Development Business To Business Cash Handling Cash Register Cold Calling Conflict Resolution Customer Relationship Management Inside Sales Marketing Merchandising Outside Sales Product Knowledge Sales Development Sales Management Sales Process Sales Prospecting Sales Territory Management Salesforce Selling Techniques Upselling Cross-Org Skills Effective Communication Results Orientation Learning Agility Digital Fluency Customer Centricity Impact & Scope Impacts function and leads and/or provides expertise to functional project teams and may participate in cross-functional initiatives. Complexity Works on complex problems where analysis of situations or data requires an in-depth evaluation of multiple factors. column2: We are looking for Transport Sales & Operations Officers in 7 Indian cities: Bangalore, Chennai, Ahmedabad, Hyderabad, Pune, Mumbai and Delhi      As our Transport Sales & Operations Officer you will be taking care of all sales and operations tasks of owned and market vehicles.      You will be managing on topline and EBITDA achievement as per respective budget and you will be responsible for our customer and vendor management.        Your tasks will be:        Understanding the supply chain of our customers      Commercial discussion with customers in coordination with head office and finalizing the agreements      Vehicle Placement (Owned and Market)      Maintaining the Service Levels      Increase in business with existing and new customers      Dedicated vehicle business      Reduce the idle time and empty runs      Secondary/Last mile deliveries with customers      Tracking the vehicles      POD collection and updating      TMS Entries      Bill Submission      Collection follow up              Who we are looking for:        Experience of 3-5 years in cold chain transport business      business administration Graduate or MBA      track record in transport sales & operations      professional communication      service and result orientation      organizational skills

column1: Team Lead Coverage Support - RFP Team
column2: Role Description The Global Client Intelligence team under the Client Coverage Division offers sales support capabilities to fulfil our clients needs in Asset Management. With a global focus and cross asset specialization, the team delivers sales enablement support through Proposals (i.e., RFPs, RFIs, DDQs,), Consultants Database Services, Corporate Biographies and other such activities. The candidate will report directly to the Regional Head of Client Intelligence. Your key responsibilities Lead a small team supporting Proposals, Consultant Databases, Corporate Biographies and sales related activities. Write Proposals as well as perform draft review, edits and establish quality check processes. Ensure responses and finalized Proposals along with allocated tasks are accurate and delivered according to established quality standards and deadlines; ensure consistency across database, documents and collateral. Perform people management responsibilities such as hiring, coaching, motivating, guiding, development, performance management for the team and intervening when necessary to complete task allocated to the team. Establish a culture that is responsive to the need of the business and ensure compliance with regulatory and business process requirements. Ensure overall compliance with relevant internal policies and regulatory requirements as they apply to the function of the team; make sure risks are identified and managed. Lead continuous process improvement practice and daily collaboration to ensure the team identifies and implements efficiencies related to data management, Proposal process, and quality checks with the regional heads of Client Intelligence. Your skills and experience We are looking for a qualified professional who has significant experience in managing all aspects of proposal, content and team management within a global financial institution. You should be an intuitive sales support specialist with a track record of directly or indirectly executing winning Proposals for a global client base in multiple time zones. Previous work experience with client relationships is compulsory. You should have a proven ability to build strong partnerships and foster cooperative and collaborative working relationships. Finally, you are a person with a high emotional quotient that can manage sensitive issues, give credible advice and inspire confidence. Education/Qualification  Requirements Minimum 6-years experience within the asset management industry answering and editing institutional RFP's and 3 years minimum Team Lead experience. Masters degree in business, finance, or marketing is required. Experience in Asset Management Institutional RFPs is preferred. Prior hand on experience on preparing Proposals, managing people and teams on a day-to-day mandatory. Hands on experience with Consultant Database and tools such as PMAPS, RocketDocs, Qvidian, Aladdin, Salesforce, Excel, PowerPoint, SharePoint. Strong process and technical knowledge of the financial markets. Proven experience in recruiting, building high performance teams with the ability to maintain a sense of humour and perspective under pressure. Team player, confident & comfortable to work in a high-paced, global, work environment.

column2: Roles and Responsibilities   Monitor & Control all trade spend and daily/monthly sales volume reporting Analyze effectiveness, efficiency, and ROI of key customer specific events Partner with sales & marketing to uncover opportunities for improved ROI Co-ordinate to create and maintain all trade spend contracts  Work with sales account management teams on a monthly basis to lead a review of promotional investment and develop plans Analyze trade deductions at month-end to ensure timely, accurately applied deductions to promotional events. Develop tools and conduct analysis to support Trade Spend Effectively Assist with project work to improve effectiveness of trade promotion events Bring visibility, transparency, and analytical rigor to trade promotions. Accepts responsibility for the organizational goals by taking ownership of new and different duties and identifying new opportunities within the Sales & Operations Departments. Desired Candidate Profile   Bachelor degree and / or 2 - 4 years of experience in sales, analytics, sales, marketing or related field preferred Strong analytical & communication skills Must be proficient in Advanced Excel Results-oriented and process driven, with high expectations of self and team Collaborative mindset with strength in effectively receiving and communicating feedback This position requires critical and strategic thinking, cross-functional collaboration, ability to work under pressure to meet deadlines, and strong customer/channel knowledge Preferred Requirements Proficient in Excel Fluent in English  Experience with SAP Software Relevant experience in food and beverage industry. and / or international sales experience a plus

With a global focus and cross asset specialization, the team delivers sales enablement support through Proposals (i.e., RFPs, RFIs, DDQs), Consultants Database Services and other such activities. Your skills and experience Minimum 1-year experience within the asset management industry You will require a solid university degree, preferably in Finance, Business, Accounting or Economics Prior hands-on experience with Microsoft Power Applications Ability to work independently as well as in a global team setup In addition, you will have to be keen to acquire new skills as you move forward as well as being able to adapt to new situations and communicating with stakeholders. Strong organizational skills are required for this role, as you will be responsible for managing multiple tasks concurrently. Your credentials should also include an excellent command of English, written and spoken (UK, US, International).

column1: Field Technical Service Engineer - Concrete Admixture
column2: KRISHAN LAL SWAMI AND   ASSOCIATES, EXECUTIVE SEARCH CONSULTANTS (KLS&A) Position: Field Tech Service Executive - Concrete Admixture and Construction Chemicals  (Confidential Client -   Global   MNC - Construction Chemicals Manufacturer with Strong Internationally   Renowned Brands) We, Krishan Lal Swami, and Associates are assisting our  Confidential Client   a Global MNC which is launching its business of Construction Chemical in India  in hiring suitable talent the position of  Field Tech Service Executive  based at  Mumbai / Thane    for its construction chemical business.  Job Responsibilities: Position Title:   Executive  Field Technical Services Job Location:    Mumbai / Thane    Position Holder Report To:   Area Sales Manager   Function:  Field Tech Service - Concrete Admixture and Other Construction Chemicals Type of Job:   Full-time, Permanent, Direct On the Company's Rolls Qualifications and experience   Qualification:  Diploma or Degree in Civil Engineering Experience:   Minimum 3 years experience  of preparing concrete mix design and selection of concrete admixtures | Experience in RMC or CC industry preferred Skills:   Knowledge of concrete mix design, testing methods according to international and Indian standards a must  Working knowledge of MS office and other software required to perform own  job desirable Main Responsibilities   Objective:  Field Technical Services team is responsible for preparing concrete mix design, select appropriate admixture for given requirement and provide on field support to customers for trouble shooting if the concrete mix performance is not meeting the requirement.  Main Tasks: Concrete Mix Design Trial, Product Selection, Development, and Business Acquisition:  Conduct concrete mix design trials in company's lab and customers laboratory as required to arrive at optimal concrete mix design for given requirement.  Select suitable product from existing range which meets the requirement of the approved concrete mix.  Tailor a customized formulation with the support of central technical laboratory if a standard product does not meet the concrete mix performance requirement.   Ensure that the mix design cost including admixtures is optimized for the best cost performance ratio in order to secure business with the customers.  Support sales team colleagues in preparing solution proposal and product approval documents. Trouble shooting:   Identify root cause for deviation from the expected performance wherever companys products are being used. The deviation may arise due to changes in properties of the concrete mix ingredients, admixtures, weather conditions and errors originating in the concrete batching plant and transit mixer.    Provide acceptable solution to the customer which may or may not include any change in the mix design, concrete mix ingredients and batching plant operations.    Ensure that the customer is always aware of the reasons for deviation in the performance if the root cause can not be eliminated. Solution provider image:   Establish solution provider image by providing inputs on technical matters other than own products also. This may include methodology for concrete pouring, selection of concrete ingredients, admixture dosing equipment and integration with the batching plant etc.    Update customers with latest in the concrete technology, test methods, challenges and solutions. Productivity:   Prepare statistical information co-relating specific cement, sand and aggregate types with the performance of specific concrete admixtures. Use statistical data to quickly arrive at the product selection and reduce the number of trials.  Establish relations with customers technical team and encourage them to do basic trouble shooting in order to eliminate or reduce number of repetitive trips and enhance productivity. Competition bursting:  Monitor competitor products and approach to providing solutions and update own management.  Prepare solution proposal that meets or exceeds competition offering in order to maintain technical lead.  Arrange samples of competing products/mix ingredients as required for further laboratory analysis in order to improve own offering to the customer. Products To Be Handled:  A Variety of Construction Chemicals  like: Concrete Admixtures | Waterproofing Chemicals | Flooring Chemicals | Concrete Repair Chemicals | Grouts | Other Specialty Construction Chemicals |  Customer Industries/Segments:  RMC Manufactures | Construction Contractors/ EPC companies | Real Estate Developers | Infrastructure Developers | Govt. Institutions/Govt. Authorities | Large Corporates, etc. Territory:   One or more of Southern States like:   Maharashtra, and Goa     Remuneration:  The remuneration/compensation is expected to be decent, which can be negotiated, and would be commensurate with your background and seniority, and your ability to add value. ABOUT OUR CLIENT (THE EMPLOYER): A very well-known Global MNC in Construction Chemicals manufacturing with Strong Brands recall in construction industry worldwide. The company has annual sales of ~$3.5 billion, employs 6,500 people, and operates in over 60 countries, with strong present through its network across all construction markets across the globe. They are now investing in India, and setting up its base  including own Office, R&D centre, and state-of-the-art Manufacturing Plant; and the business is slated to commence soon, and the preparatory work is in progress. India top leadership team has been hired; and the sales/business and technical support teams are being hired now.  Their Construction Chemical Products are planned to be launched in India  in a phased manner, which would have to be handled by the sales and technical team. The new business is being built up from a scratch, but due to very strong Brand strength, the business is expected to ramp-up and grow rapidly.     ABOUT US:   We, Krishan Lal Swami and Associates (KLS&A), are an Executive Search firm focused on Leadership Hiring for the Board/C-Suite/CXO/ Senior and Upper Middle Management level positions across industry sectors, and a variety of roles / functions, on pan-India basis. We support some of the top Indian corporate houses and global MNCs in hiring the best human talent We have a talented team of sector specialists and versatile multi-sector search professionals (MBAs from well-known institutes from India & abroad, engineers, cost & management accountants, company secretaries, Ph.D.) with diverse backgrounds, and collective experience of 150+ man-years in the industry/corporate sector/ consulting across a myriad of industry domains (e.g. engineering, construction & infrastructure; manufacturing; consumers; chemicals and life sciences; technology; shipping & logistics; banking & financial sector; etc.) Our promoters are accomplished top level corporate professionals with 70+ man-years of experience in strategy, general management, governance, finance, legal, HR, IT, and commercial management. Our founders have worked at the Board of Directors level with reputed Indian conglomerates having diversified businesses  manufacturing, engineering, EPC, construction, real estate, conventional and non-conventional energy, international trading, logistics, shipping, and ports, education, and media; and thus, have good network and contacts in these fields We strive to excel in our service to all our esteemed clients - big or smallWe are willing to invest in building special resources / infrastructure for meeting the specific needs of our esteemed clients.  For more information about us, please visit our website: https://www.klsanda.com/
