Products To Be Handled:  A Variety of Construction Chemicals ??like: Concrete Admixtures | Waterproofing Chemicals | Flooring Chemicals | Concrete Repair Chemicals | Grouts | Other Specialty Construction Chemicals |  Customer Industries/Segments:  RMC Manufactures | Construction Contractors/ EPC companies | Real Estate Developers | Infrastructure Developers | Govt. Institutions/Govt. Authorities | Large Corporates, etc. Territory:   One or more of Southern States like:   Karnataka, and Kerala  Remuneration:  The remuneration/compensation is expected to be decent, which can be negotiated, and would be commensurate with your background and seniority, and your ability to add value. ABOUT OUR CLIENT (THE EMPLOYER): A very well-known Global MNC in Construction Chemicals manufacturing with Strong Brands recall in construction industry worldwide. The company has annual sales of ~$3.5 billion, employs 6,500 people, and operates in over 60 countries, with strong present through its network across all construction markets across the globe. They are now investing in India, and setting up its base ??including own Office, R&D centre, and state-of-the-art Manufacturing Plant; and the business is slated to commence soon, and the preparatory work is in progress. India top leadership team has been hired; and the sales/business and technical support teams are being hired now.  Their Construction Chemical Products are planned to be launched in India ??in a phased manner, which would have to be handled by the sales and technical team. The new business is being built up from a scratch, but due to very strong Brand strength, the business is expected to ramp-up and grow rapidly.     ABOUT US:   We, Krishan Lal Swami and Associates (KLS&A), are an Executive Search firm focused on Leadership Hiring for the Board/C-Suite/CXO/ Senior and Upper Middle Management level positions across industry sectors, and a variety of roles / functions, on pan-India basis. We support some of the top Indian corporate houses and global MNCs in hiring the best human talent We have a talented team of sector specialists and versatile multi-sector search professionals (MBAs from well-known institutes from India & abroad, engineers, cost & management accountants, company secretaries, Ph.D.) with diverse backgrounds, and collective experience of 150+ man-years in the industry/corporate sector/ consulting across a myriad of industry domains (e.g. engineering, construction & infrastructure; manufacturing; consumers; chemicals and life sciences; technology; shipping & logistics; banking & financial sector; etc.) Our promoters are accomplished top level corporate professionals with 70+ man-years of experience in strategy, general management, governance, finance, legal, HR, IT, and commercial management. Our founders have worked at the Board of Directors level with reputed Indian conglomerates having diversified businesses ??manufacturing, engineering, EPC, construction, real estate, conventional and non-conventional energy, international trading, logistics, shipping, and ports, education, and media; and thus, have good network and contacts in these fields We strive to excel in our service to all our esteemed clients - big or smallWe are willing to invest in building special resources / infrastructure for meeting the specific needs of our esteemed clients.  For more information about us, please visit our website: https://www.klsanda.com/

column2: As a Counsellor / Consultant at GradXs Study Abroad powered by Study Metro, your primary role would be to provide guidance and support to students & their families throughout the process. You should be capable of handling work under pressure and should be able to meet deadlines & achieve targets. Here are some key roles and responsibilities you will be required to undertake: Student Assessment: Assessing students' academic background, interests, goals, and preferences to understand their suitability for studying abroad and to help them choose appropriate programs and institutions. Educational Planning: Assisting students in selecting suitable courses, programs, and universities based on their academic qualifications, career aspirations, and financial capacities/constraints. Application Assistance: Guiding students through the application process, including filling out forms, preparing required documents such as transcripts and recommendation letters, and meeting deadlines for submission. Test Preparation: Providing information and resources to help students prepare for standardized tests such as the TOEFL, IELTS, SAT, GRE, or GMAT, and offering support in registering for and scheduling test dates. Visa and Immigration Support: Advising students on visa requirements, assisting with visa applications, preparing necessary documentation, and providing guidance on immigration procedures and regulations. Financial Aid and Scholarships: Offering information and guidance on available scholarships, grants, and As a Counsellor / Consultant at GradXs Study Abroad powered by Study Metro, your primary role would be to provide guidance and support to students & their families throughout the process. You should be capable of handling work under pressure and should be able to meet deadlines & achieve targets. Here are some key roles and responsibilities you will be required to undertake: Student Assessment: Assessing students' academic background, interests, goals, and preferences to understand their suitability for studying abroad and to help them choose appropriate programs and institutions. Educational Planning: Assisting students in selecting suitable courses, programs, and universities based on their academic qualifications, career aspirations, and financial capacities/constraints. Application Assistance: Guiding students through the application process, including filling out forms, preparing required documents such as transcripts and recommendation letters, and meeting deadlines for submission. Test Preparation: Providing information and resources to help students prepare for standardized tests such as the TOEFL, IELTS, SAT, GRE, or GMAT, and offering support in registering for and scheduling test dates. Visa and Immigration Support: Advising students on visa requirements, assisting with visa applications, preparing necessary documentation, and providing guidance on immigration procedures and regulations. Financial Aid and Scholarships: Offering information and guidance on available scholarships, grants, and financial aid options, as well as assisting students in preparing scholarship applications and essays. Pre-Departure Orientation: Conducting pre-departure orientations to prepare students for studying and living abroad, covering topics such as cultural adjustment, academic expectations, housing arrangements, and safety precautions. Post-Arrival Support: Providing ongoing support to students after they arrive at their study destination, addressing any issues or concerns they may encounter and helping them adjust to their new environment. Relationship Management: Building and maintaining strong relationships with students and their families, as well as with educational institutions and other stakeholders, to ensure high levels of satisfaction and retention. Professional Development: Staying updated on trends and developments in the study abroad industry, attending relevant workshops and conferences, and continuously improving knowledge and skills related to counselling and student support. Last date for Applications: June 22, 2024 Selected candidates will join in August 2024.

column2: As a Counsellor / Consultant at GradXs Study Abroad powered by Study Metro, your primary role would be to provide guidance and support to students & their families throughout the process. You should be capable of handling work under pressure and should be able to meet deadlines & achieve targets.  Here are some key roles and responsibilities you will be required to undertake: - Student Assessment: Assessing students' academic background, interests, goals, and preferences to understand their suitability for studying abroad and to help them choose appropriate programs and institutions. - Educational Planning: Assisting students in selecting suitable courses, programs, and universities based on their academic qualifications, career aspirations, and financial capacities/constraints. - Application Assistance: Guiding students through the application process, including filling out forms, preparing required documents such as transcripts and recommendation letters, and meeting deadlines for submission. - Test Preparation: Providing information and resources to help students prepare for standardized tests such as the TOEFL, IELTS, SAT, GRE, or GMAT, and offering support in registering for and scheduling test dates. - Visa and Immigration Support: Advising students on visa requirements, assisting with visa applications, preparing necessary documentation, and providing guidance on immigration procedures and regulations. - Financial Aid and Scholarships: Offering information and guidance on available scholarships, grants, and financial aid options, as well as assisting students in preparing scholarship applications and essays. - Pre-Departure Orientation: Conducting pre-departure orientations to prepare students for studying and living abroad, covering topics such as cultural adjustment, academic expectations, housing arrangements, and safety precautions. - Post-Arrival Support: Providing ongoing support to students after they arrive at their study destination, addressing any issues or concerns they may encounter and helping them adjust to their new environment. - Relationship Management: Building and maintaining strong relationships with students and their families, as well as with educational institutions and other stakeholders, to ensure high levels of satisfaction and retention. Professional Development: Staying updated on trends and developments in the study abroad industry, attending relevant workshops and conferences, and continuously improving knowledge and skills related to counselling and student support    Send detailed CV with Cover Letter clearly indicating the Position you are applying for. You must mention your existing and expected salary in your cover letter. Shortlisted candidates will be called for online / face-to-face interview. CVs sent without cover-letter will not be considered. Last date for Applications: June 22, 2024 Selected candidates will join in August 2024.
column11: counselling, Counsellor, Immigration, student counselling, Educational Planning, Student Assessment, Visa Counselling

column2: Job description Job Title: Customer Service Sales Representative Location:  Hyderabad, India Employment Type:  Full-Time Salary:  Fixed Salary with Incentives About Us: AHS (Advanced Hair Services)  is a leading hair transplant and salon company dedicated to providing exceptional hair care and transformation services. We pride ourselves on our expert team, state-of-the-art facilities, and personalized customer care. We are looking for a well-groomed, presentable, and dynamic Customer Service Sales Representative to join our team in Hyderabad. Position Overview: The Customer Service Sales Representative will play a crucial role in driving customer satisfaction and sales at our Hyderabad location. This role involves engaging with clients, understanding their needs, promoting our services, and ensuring a seamless customer experience. The ideal candidate will be smart, confident, and fluent in both English and Telugu. Key Responsibilities: Customer Engagement:  Greet and welcome clients in a warm, friendly manner, ensuring a positive first impression of our services. Sales and Consultation:  Conduct consultations to understand client needs and recommend suitable hair transplant and salon services. Present and promote services effectively to drive sales and achieve targets. Client Relationship Management:  Build and maintain strong relationships with clients, providing personalized care and follow-up to enhance their overall experience. Communication:  Communicate service details, pricing, and promotional offers clearly and confidently in both English and Telugu, addressing any questions or concerns the clients may have. Appointment Management:  Schedule and manage client appointments, ensuring timely and efficient service delivery. Upselling and Cross-Selling:  Identify opportunities to upsell and cross-sell additional services or products that benefit the clients and enhance their experience. Customer Feedback:  Gather and document client feedback, addressing any issues or complaints promptly and escalating as necessary to ensure customer satisfaction. Record Keeping:  Maintain accurate records of client interactions, sales transactions, and appointment schedules in the companys CRM system. Team Collaboration:  Work closely with the salon and hair transplant teams to coordinate client services and ensure a seamless experience from consultation to service completion. Appearance and Presentation:  Maintain a professional and well-groomed appearance at all times, reflecting the company's high standards of service and image. Required Qualifications: Experience:  2+ years of experience in customer service or sales, preferably in the beauty, wellness, or healthcare industry. Education:  High school diploma or equivalent; a degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field is a plus. Skills: Excellent verbal and written communication skills in both English and Telugu. Strong interpersonal skills with the ability to build rapport with clients. Confident, persuasive, and presentable with a professional demeanor. Sales-driven mindset with a proven track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets. Ability to handle customer concerns with empathy and professionalism. Technical Proficiency:  Familiarity with CRM software and basic computer skills for managing appointments and sales records. Preferred Qualifications: Industry Knowledge:  Understanding of hair care, salon services, or cosmetic procedures is advantageous. Sales Techniques:  Experience with upselling and cross-selling in a customer service environment. Benefits: Competitive fixed salary with attractive performance-based incentives. Comprehensive training and professional development opportunities. Access to company-provided grooming and wellness services. Supportive and dynamic work environment. How to Apply: Walk in the center anyday between 11 AM to 7 PM except Tuesday.

column1: Field Technical Service Engineer - Concrete Admixture
column2: KRISHAN LAL SWAMI AND   ASSOCIATES, EXECUTIVE SEARCH CONSULTANTS (KLS&A) Position: Field Tech Service Executive - Concrete Admixture and Construction Chemicals  (Confidential Client -   Global   MNC - Construction Chemicals Manufacturer with Strong Internationally   Renowned Brands) We, Krishan Lal Swami, and Associates are assisting our  Confidential Client   a Global MNC which is launching its business of Construction Chemical in India  in hiring suitable talent the position of  Field Tech Service Executive  based at  Hyderabad  for its construction chemical business.  Job Responsibilities: Position Title:   Executive  Field Technical Services Job Location:    Hyderabad     Position Holder Report To:   Area Sales Manager   Function:  Field Tech Service - Concrete Admixture and Other Construction Chemicals Type of Job:   Full-time, Permanent, Direct On the Company's Rolls Qualifications and experience   Qualification:  Diploma or Degree in Civil Engineering Experience:   Minimum 3 years experience  of preparing concrete mix design and selection of concrete admixtures | Experience in RMC or CC industry preferred Skills:   Knowledge of concrete mix design, testing methods according to international and Indian standards a must  Working knowledge of MS office and other software required to perform own  job desirable Main Responsibilities   Objective:  Field Technical Services team is responsible for preparing concrete mix design, select appropriate admixture for given requirement and provide on field support to customers for trouble shooting if the concrete mix performance is not meeting the requirement.  Main Tasks: Concrete Mix Design Trial, Product Selection, Development, and Business Acquisition:  Conduct concrete mix design trials in company's lab and customers laboratory as required to arrive at optimal concrete mix design for given requirement.  Select suitable product from existing range which meets the requirement of the approved concrete mix.  Tailor a customized formulation with the support of central technical laboratory if a standard product does not meet the concrete mix performance requirement.   Ensure that the mix design cost including admixtures is optimized for the best cost performance ratio in order to secure business with the customers.  Support sales team colleagues in preparing solution proposal and product approval documents. Trouble shooting:   Identify root cause for deviation from the expected performance wherever companys products are being used. The deviation may arise due to changes in properties of the concrete mix ingredients, admixtures, weather conditions and errors originating in the concrete batching plant and transit mixer.    Provide acceptable solution to the customer which may or may not include any change in the mix design, concrete mix ingredients and batching plant operations.    Ensure that the customer is always aware of the reasons for deviation in the performance if the root cause can not be eliminated. Solution provider image:   Establish solution provider image by providing inputs on technical matters other than own products also. This may include methodology for concrete pouring, selection of concrete ingredients, admixture dosing equipment and integration with the batching plant etc.    Update customers with latest in the concrete technology, test methods, challenges and solutions. Productivity:   Prepare statistical information co-relating specific cement, sand and aggregate types with the performance of specific concrete admixtures. Use statistical data to quickly arrive at the product selection and reduce the number of trials.  Establish relations with customers technical team and encourage them to do basic trouble shooting in order to eliminate or reduce number of repetitive trips and enhance productivity. Competition bursting:  Monitor competitor products and approach to providing solutions and update own management.  Prepare solution proposal that meets or exceeds competition offering in order to maintain technical lead.  Arrange samples of competing products/mix ingredients as required for further laboratory analysis in order to improve own offering to the customer. Products To Be Handled:  A Variety of Construction Chemicals  like: Concrete Admixtures | Waterproofing Chemicals | Flooring Chemicals | Concrete Repair Chemicals | Grouts | Other Specialty Construction Chemicals |  Customer Industries/Segments:  RMC Manufactures | Construction Contractors/ EPC companies | Real Estate Developers | Infrastructure Developers | Govt. Institutions/Govt. Authorities | Large Corporates, etc. Territory:   One or more of Southern States like:   Telangana and Andhra Pradesh  Remuneration:  The remuneration/compensation is expected to be decent, which can be negotiated, and would be commensurate with your background and seniority, and your ability to add value. ABOUT OUR CLIENT (THE EMPLOYER): A very well-known Global MNC in Construction Chemicals manufacturing with Strong Brands recall in construction industry worldwide. The company has annual sales of ~$3.5 billion, employs 6,500 people, and operates in over 60 countries, with strong present through its network across all construction markets across the globe. They are now investing in India, and setting up its base ??including own Office, R&D centre, and state-of-the-art Manufacturing Plant; and the business is slated to commence soon, and the preparatory work is in progress. India top leadership team has been hired; and the sales/business and technical support teams are being hired now.  Their Construction Chemical Products are planned to be launched in India ??in a phased manner, which would have to be handled by the sales and technical team. The new business is being built up from a scratch, but due to very strong Brand strength, the business is expected to ramp-up and grow rapidly.     ABOUT US:   We, Krishan Lal Swami and Associates (KLS&A), are an Executive Search firm focused on Leadership Hiring for the Board/C-Suite/CXO/ Senior and Upper Middle Management level positions across industry sectors, and a variety of roles / functions, on pan-India basis. We support some of the top Indian corporate houses and global MNCs in hiring the best human talent We have a talented team of sector specialists and versatile multi-sector search professionals (MBAs from well-known institutes from India & abroad, engineers, cost & management accountants, company secretaries, Ph.D.) with diverse backgrounds, and collective experience of 150+ man-years in the industry/corporate sector/ consulting across a myriad of industry domains (e.g. engineering, construction & infrastructure; manufacturing; consumers; chemicals and life sciences; technology; shipping & logistics; banking & financial sector; etc.) Our promoters are accomplished top level corporate professionals with 70+ man-years of experience in strategy, general management, governance, finance, legal, HR, IT, and commercial management. Our founders have worked at the Board of Directors level with reputed Indian conglomerates having diversified businesses ??manufacturing, engineering, EPC, construction, real estate, conventional and non-conventional energy, international trading, logistics, shipping, and ports, education, and media; and thus, have good network and contacts in these fields We strive to excel in our service to all our esteemed clients - big or smallWe are willing to invest in building special resources / infrastructure for meeting the specific needs of our esteemed clients.  For more information about us, please visit our website: https://www.klsanda.com/

column2: About Innvendt: Innvendt is at the forefront of digitizing the electrical infrastructure, transforming how businesses manage their electrical operations with intelligent solutions. Our core focus lies in infusing existing electrical systems with sensors and software to provide real-time monitoring, workflow digitization, and enhanced safety measures. We partner with global Fortune 500 & Forbes 2000 companies in sectors like Oil & Gas, Minerals, Energy, Pharma & Telecom, driving innovation and efficiency in the industry. Job   Description:  Lead Development Intern Overview: As a Lead Development Intern with Innvendts Enterprise sales team, you will play a pivotal role in driving revenue expansion. Your focus will be on fostering relationships with both new and existing customers. Dive into conversations about the transformative potential of IoT Internet of Things) across productivity enhancement, workplace safety, predictive maintenance, asset management, and regulatory compliance. Responsibilities:  Strategic Relationship Development: Cultivate connections with executives within strategic, named accounts.  End-to-End Customer Engagement: Support customers throughout the sales journey, from initial prospecting to deal closure.  Solution-Oriented Sales Techniques: Learn and apply solution-based sales strategies in complex campaigns.  Pipeline Generation: Contribute to pipeline growth through targeted outbound prospecting efforts. Requirements:  Currently pursuing or recently completed a Bachelors degree, B.Tech, MBA, BBA, or any relevant degree with a keen interest in sales.  Prior sales experience or internship is advantageous.  Strong interpersonal and negotiation skills.  Thrives in a dynamic, fast-paced environment.  Willingness to engage in high-volume cold calling and strategic outbound prospecting.  Eagerness to learn and actively contribute to a high-performing sales team. This Business Growth Intern role provides a unique opportunity to gain hands-on experience in enterprise sales, develop valuable skills, and contribute significantly to Innvendts sales success. Discover How Innvendt's Flexible Working Traits Align With Your Needs: 1. Autonomy in Work Management: You have the freedom to manage your own work at Innvendt. You can choose the projects and tasks that interest you the most or where you believe you can make the most impact. However, this autonomy comes with the responsibility of aligning your efforts with your colleagues and cross-functional teams to ensure everyone is running in the same direction that gets the work done. 2. Limited Work from Home: We prefer that you work from the office and from the field, especially when you need to meet with colleagues, customers, vendors, and other business stakeholders. However, we do allow for occasional work-from-home days, providing you with a break from the office environment and customer hustle and bustle. 3. Negotiable Deadlines: Deadlines at Innvendt are not set in stone and can be negotiated by you. However, once a deadline is agreed upon, you are expected to meet it. If you realise you will not be able to meet a deadline, you are expected to communicate this as soon as possible 4. Ownership: Innvendt values employees who take ownership of their work. This means not only taking responsibility for completing tasks and projects but also for the outcomes of that work. When you demonstrate ownership, your efforts are celebrated and rewarded. 5. Something beyond yourself and work: Once you are at Innvendt, we would love to see you spend time on things beyond family, work, and personal interests. This could be varied. A few examples: Tutoring underprivileged kids, Cleaning up a lake or a well, Traffic Volunteering, Planting trees in your community and city, Mentoring young professionals. Location:   WFO Jubilee   Hills,   Hyderabad,   Telangana.

column2: Customer Service: Officer Customer Relation is responsible for providing excellent service to customers, including responding promptly and professionally to inquiries, complaints, and feedback. Relationship Building: Officer Customer Relation is responsible for building and maintaining positive relationships with customers, including identifying and addressing their needs and concerns. Sales Support: Officer Customer Relation is responsible for providing support to the sales team by maintaining customer records, preparing reports, providing data analysis, creating, and amendment of SOC, and uploading POs. Billing: Officer Customer Relation is responsible for coordinating with Finance for creating invoices and sending invoices to customers for products or services provided. Billing may involve managing customer accounts, processing payments, and responding to billing inquiries or disputes. Discrepancy Management: Officer Customer Relation is responsible for identifying and resolving discrepancies or errors in data or processes or products. Sample Management: The Officer Customer Relation is responsible for managing the collection of samples. The key objective of sample management is to ensure that samples are properly collected, labeled, and stored, and that accurate. Sample management may involve billing of samples in case of nonreceipt of the samples back. Payment Follow-ups: Follow up with customers promptly after the payment due date has passed, either by phone or email, to remind them of the outstanding payment and to inquire about the reason for the delay. Complaint Resolution: Resolving customer complaints in a timely and professional manner, including identifying the root cause and taking corrective action. Communication: Communicating effectively with customers, colleagues, and other stakeholders through various channels, including phone, and email. Data Management: Maintaining accurate and complete customer records, including contact information, purchase history, and customer feedback. Product Knowledge: Maintaining up-to-date knowledge of the company's products and services, and communicating this information effectively to customers. Brand Management: Managing the company's brand image and reputation by ensuring that customer interactions are professional, positive, and consistent with the company's values and mission.

column2: Role & responsibilities   Zycus is looking out for Manager - Strategic Alliances, with experience of about 5-8 years, and a hands-on experience on at least 5 years with top Management & Procurement Consulting firms and large System Integrators driving ?relationships across Supply Chain, Procurement or ERP practice for our Alliances team for APAC region. The resources ?should be self driven, motivated to drive the ?alliance partner based segregations in our two major markets  US and Non-US. These are key executing roles that will enable the resource to build the Partner business for our growing world class product company.  Preferred experience in ERP, SaaS, P2P - Procure to Pay, Source to Pay, financial software product sales.The incumbent will be reporting to Director - Alliances.     Responsibilities: The incumbent would create, manage & grow the Alliances eco-system for all Business territories in APJ market Preferred expertise and relationship in each of the two major segregations is a plus. He / She would be responsible for hunting & nurturing potential partners & resellers in his/her territories. The Partner network would primarily include Tier 1 Consulting organizations like Big 4 consultancies like: Accenture, KPMG, Deloitte etc. and Large System Integrators like TCS, Infosys, IBM, TechM, Cognizant, CapGemini, HCL and niche partners/ boutique firms who operate in the assigned markets - focused on procurement solution practice/consulting and Procurement product/transformation selling He / She should be able to build and manage complex network of relationships within these organizations, identify key account managers for major deals and influence them to work with Zycus. Support Sales to generate a good pipeline of New Opportunities with the help of these Alliance relationships. He should be able to drive partner enablement programs & trainings to help partners become ready to deal with Zycus' suite independently. Key Matrix is to build partner execution capability. Plan and drive marketing programs, News Letters etc for Alliances assigned regionally /locally . Liase between Regional Sales & Partner SPOCs and run meeting scrums to assess joint businesses. Handle internal & external Coordination , Legal agreements with new / existing partners, finance payment advice , status of project milestone, cadence calls, RFX response scouting for partners & creating the data pool. Reporting & Data collection - Creating & managing reports in Salesforce & alliances related data hadling. Handling Zycus Demo setup & issues, Litmos access to new partners , Litmos access issues and Litmos new course assignment.  External Skills And Expertise    A minimum of 5-7 years of relevant experience is a must. Must have a thorough understanding of Alliance Relationships in international business scenario(Local/Regional/Global) and should be able to drive these relationships with Sales to close Large deals. Sound understanding and knowledge of complex enterprise deals and partner influencers and relationship management. Ability to work with regional sales team collaboratively driving complex enterprise deals. Will be responsible to drive monthly, quarterly & annual revenue numbers from Alliance business.Should be able to drive lead generation through Alliances, Account based marketing and joint field marketing programs.       Benefits Five Reasons Why You Should Join Zycus Join the Experts: Zycus has been consistently recognized by Gartner and Forrester as a Leader in Strategic Sourcing and Source-to-Contract Suites. We moved further on the completeness of vision axis within a year in the Gartner Magic Quadrant for Procure-to-Pay Suites, published in October 2020. (https://www.zycus.com/) Play a critical role in taking the business to the next level and champion thought leadership in Autonomous Procurement with our Merlin AI Suite Advance your career with us. Were enthusiastic to help our employees learn different aspects of the business, be challenged with new tasks, be mentored and grow. column2: Company Vision: NowPurchase is transforming the $140B Metal Manufacturing industry. The metal industry forms the backbone of the economy and the fundamental block of the physical world - be it transportation, construction, and every machinery. NowPurchase is a rich, digital marketplace where metal manufacturers (foundries + steel plants) can procure high-quality raw materials (scrap, pig iron, ferroalloys, additives, nodularisers) in a trusted manner. Our technology allows them to optimize their manufacturing process to ensure high productivity and resilience to failure. We currently serve over 250 factories nationwide and are looking to aggressively expand our footprint across India. You can learn more on www.nowpurchase.com. Role Description: We are seeking a highly motivated and organized Sales Coordinator to join our dynamic sales team. The Sales Coordinator will play a vital role in supporting the sales department by managing various administrative tasks, coordinating sales activities, and providing exceptional customer service. The ideal candidate should have excellent communication skills, strong attention to detail, and the ability to multitask effectively. This position offers an exciting opportunity to contribute to our company's growth and success. ?Key Responsibilities:?? Provide comprehensive administrative support to the sales team, encompassing tasks such as preparing sales reports, presentations, proposals, and maintaining sales documents, contracts, and related materials. Conduct payment follow-ups' and ensure payment terms are adhered to as per credit policy. Attend customer queries, any sales queries, and grievances, respond politely, and delight customers by going the extra mile. Process sales orders accurately and efficiently, coordinating with internal teams to ensure prompt and timely fulfillment and delivery of ? orders.? Ensure all files, CRM and ERP are maintained meticulously, cost documents and reports, MIS are up to date in Zoho. Assist in preparing and distributing sales documentation, ensuring proper organization and storage. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to support sales initiatives, resolve issues, and enhance communication and collaboration. What Your Day Job Involves: Administrative Support: Provide comprehensive administrative assistance to the sales team, including preparing reports, presentations, and proposals, and maintaining sales documents and contracts. Customer Service Excellence: Delight customers by attending to queries and grievances promptly and politely, ensuring exceptional service and satisfaction. Order Processing and Coordination: Process sales orders accurately and efficiently, coordinating with internal teams to ensure prompt fulfillment and delivery. Documentation Management: Maintain meticulous records in CRM and ERP systems, ensuring all files, reports, and documentation are organized and up to date. Qualification & Experience: Graduate with 1 to 3 years prior experience as a sales coordinator/sales support executive/Voice process customer service /support roles in any industry. Should have very good working knowledge of Microsoft Excel, Word with strong follow up skills & customer service orientation. Ability to work independently and collaboratively within a team. Prior experience in the industry or product knowledge is a plus. ?Compensation & Benefits: Compensation: Wont be a blocker for the right candidate Medical Insurance: Benefits of group insurance of 3 lakhs for family including parents, spouse, children. Accidental Insurance: Benefits of 5 lakhs of medical insurance for self, covering 24*7 Generous leave structure. Possible Growth path: Sales Coordinator > Senior Sales? Coordinator>Assistant Manager- Customer Servicing > Deputy Manager- Customer Servicing > Manager-Customer Servicing Hiring Process:  ? ? ? Screening of applicants & initial telephonic call with HR  ? ? ? F2F/Video Interview with Hiring Manager  ? ? ? Final round with Founder & CEO  ? ? ? Email communication on final feedback The end to end process shall take less than 15 days. We pride ourselves on being transparent & moving fast. Candidates who accept an offer may join within 1 hour, 1 week or up to 45days of signing - though, we have a preference for as short a gap period between signing and joining since we're at the most exciting part of our journey - laying the foundation for the NowPurchase platform!

column2: Title/Designation:    Sales Co-ordinator Reports to:    Senior Marketing Manager Location:    Ahmedabad Industry:    Medical Devices/Surgical/Pharmaceutical Qualification:    MBA (Marketing) preferred / Bachelors degree with distinction Experience:    2-3 years Salary:    Commensurate with Experience & Qualification     About us:     Aegis Lifesciences is a globally recognized leader in the manufacturing and export of medical devices, operating from its state-of-the-art facilities in India. The company specializes in producing high-quality absorbable and non-absorbable hemostats. Aegis upholds the highest quality standards, holding certifications as ISO:13485, MDSAP, and adhering to GMP standards of multiple countries.    About the role: We are seeking a highly organized and detail-oriented International Sales Coordinator to manage export order fulfilment and facilitate seamless international trade. You will be responsible for creating proforma invoices, liaising with production and dispatch teams to ensure on-time deliveries, and acting as the primary point of contact between marketing, production, and dispatch for international orders. This role requires effective communication and interpersonal skills to foster smooth collaboration across departments.    Responsibilities:   Generate accurate and professional proforma invoices for international customers using ERP tool, ensuring all necessary details are included (e.g., product descriptions, pricing, Incoterms, payment terms) Collaborate with the marketing team to understand customer requirements, and translate them into clear and actionable production orders Maintain proactive and clear communication with the production department to ensure timely order fulfilment, and promptly address any potential production delays Liaise with the dispatch team to confirm shipment details, track order progress, and resolve any logistical issues promptly Maintain clear communication with international clients regarding order status, shipment details, and any potential issues Maintain accurate records of all international trade transactions   Additional skills Familiarity with customs regulations and procedures Experience with international trade software Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work under pressure Proficiency in multiple languages is an advantage     Candidate requirements:   Strong understanding of international trade processes, including export documentation and Incoterms. Proficient in MS Office Suite (Word, Excel, Outlook). Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English  Strong organizational skills and attention to detail. Excellent interpersonal skills and the ability to build rapport with colleagues  Benefits of working at Aegis: Work in a fast-paced and dynamic international business environment with diverse cultural interactions. Gain comprehensive experience in the entire export process, from order fulfilment to logistics coordination. Play a key role in facilitating international trade, building strong client relationships, and contributing to global business growth. Ready to join our team? Submit your portfolio and resume today.

The ideal candidate will be someone with a foundational knowledge of sales principles and a keen interest in developing their career in sales development. In this role, you will be responsible for generating new leads, conducting initial outreach, and qualifying prospects to support our sales pipeline. Maintain accurate records of all lead interactions and activities in our CRM system. Collaborate with the sales and marketing teams to align efforts and share insights. Participate in ongoing training and professional development opportunities to enhance sales skills and product knowledge. Meet or exceed defined activity and lead generation targets. Required Skills and Qualifications: High school diploma or equivalent; Bachelors degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field preferred. Conduct market research and competitor analysis to stay abreast of industry trends, identify emerging opportunities, and optimize sales strategies accordingly. column2: Sales Support Analyst Description - Job Summary This role is responsible for managing projects to improve sales processes and CRM enhancements, generating comprehensive reports, and providing support to the sales team. The role resolves order management issues in compliance with company policies, regulations, and ethical standards. The role guides junior team members while continuously evaluating and implementing sales support tools and technology for increased productivity. Responsibilities Undertakes projects aimed at improving sales processes, implementing CRM (Customer Relationship Management) system enhancements, or supporting sales-related initiatives. Maintains accurate records and documentation of sales-related activities, contracts, and customer interactions. Generates comprehensive reports and dashboards to provide insights into sales performance and trends. Provides support to the sales team by addressing customer inquiries, resolving issues, and assisting with order processing. Ensures timely resolution of open order (backlog) reports, coordinating with team members and other internal teams as necessary. Utilizes specialized knowledge to resolve complex order management issues and support critical projects across product lines. Oversees the CRM (Customer Relationship Management) system, ensuring it is effectively utilized to track customer interactions and sales activities. Prepares and communicates issue resolutions for external customers and collaborates with external-facing representatives as needed. Evaluates and implements sales support tools and technology to enhance productivity and effectiveness. Ensures that sales processes adhere to company policies, industry regulations, and ethical standards. Education & Experience  Recommended Four-year or Graduate Degree in Sales, Business Administration, or any other related discipline or commensurate work experience or demonstrated competence. Typically has 4-7 years of work experience, preferably in customer support, sales operations, sales support, people management, or a related field or an advanced degree with 3-5 years of work experience. Complexity Responds to moderately complex issues within established guidelines. Disclaimer This job description describes the general nature and level of work performed in this role. It is not intended to be an exhaustive list of all duties, skills, responsibilities, knowledge, etc. These may be subject to change and additional functions may be assigned as needed by management. column2: Location:  Bangalore Company Name:  SiliconMedia Publishing (http://siliconmediapublishing.com) Designation:  International Sales Process Executive Job Type:  Night shift, Monday to Friday, 8 Pm - 6 Am. Salary  : 3.5 to 5 lakh per annum + monthly performance incentives. Qualification:  Fresh Engineering Graduates (B.E./B.Tech any stream). SiliconMedia Publishing is on the lookout for sharp, innovative engineering minds ready to step into the world of international sales. We are seeking individuals who can blend their reasoning acumen with exceptional communication skills to engage with our prestigious US clientele.  Responsibilities:  Utilize strong comprehension skills to accurately understand and address client needs and questions. Engage with marketing, editorial, and operations teams to streamline internal processes. Collaborate with our inbound sales team to manage client needs effectively. Craft persuasive responses to client inquiries, supporting our sales efforts. Manage project requirements efficiently, ensuring all tasks are completed correctly and on time. Adhere to quality requirements, achieve targets/volumes in given TAT(Turn around time). Requirements Excellent command of written formal English to effectively communicate with clients. Craft clear and structured responses to client inquiries, ensuring a seamless flow and professional tone. Ability to quickly learn and understand what different companies do and what products they offer by researching online/google.  Benefits:  Enjoy the stability of a fixed salary with the added excitement of variable monthly incentives. Dedicated and hardworking team members can see their earnings go up to 70,000 - 80,000 per month within just 6 to 9 months. We pride ourselves on internal promotions. Show exemplary communication skills, and you could be leading your own team as a sales lead, with a total compensation package exceeding 12 lakh per year, in as little as one year after joining.  While most IT firms in Bangalore require engineers to have over 5 years of experience before considering a promotion to Business Development, we offer a unique advantage. Join us and skip the queue! Embrace a dynamic and lucrative career path that not only values but also leverages your engineering expertise from day one. Your salary reflects your education, skills, and ability to learn quickly. While experience is not required, your smartness and performance will drive your earnings. Comprehensive health insurance plan for employees and family, available at the discounted corporate rate.  A significant portion of your pay comes from performance-based incentives, rewarding your achievements each month. Complimentary snacks and refreshments to keep you energized throughout the night shift.   Application Process:  Visit our office for a walk-in interview from Monday to Friday between 11 Am. and 5 Pm. Please bring a copy of your CV for the initial written assessment. Alternatively, you have the option to submit your CV via email. Upon receiving your CV, we will coordinate with you to schedule a time for the first-round written test. Our address SiliconMedia Publishing  No.124, 2nd Floor, Surya Chambers,South Block, Old Airport Main Road,  Murugeshpalya, Opp to ISRO, Bangalore - 560017. Contact No : 7406432636/ 08046441118.

column2: Role   Profile Business   Development   Executive   (BDE) January 2023 For Internal Circulation Only   ROLE   SPECIFICATION Role Title Business Development Executive (BDE) Employee Interviewed Reports To Branch Manager (BM) Company Muthoot FinCorp Function/Department Branch Business Written By Korn Ferry Approved By (Jobholder) Approved By (Immediate Superior) Date (Written On) 17-01-2023 ROLE   SUMMARY The Business Development Executive (BDE) is responsible for identifying new business opportunities, driving new customer acquisitions in the assigned territory and plays a key role in achieving business targets. The role is expected to increase the customer base of the branch, build relationships with potential customers, and ensure business growth through business development activities. ORGANIZATIONAL   CHART Area Manager Branch Manager Asst. Branch Manager Customer Service Executive  Business   Development   Executive KEY   RESPONSIBILITIES  Customer Acquisition ??Generate new leads and implement strategies to acquire new customers  through lead generation initiatives including self-generated prospecting efforts,  individual networking, tele sales, events, field visits etc. ??Increase the customer base of the branch by developing business relationships  with current and prospective customers. ??Act as a liaison between potential customers and the business, delivering  important feedback from the field in terms of product offerings and business  development or branding initiatives. ??Facilitate the end-to-end process of customer acquisition and collaborate with  internal teams to deliver a seamless customer onboarding experience. Sales Planning ??Create prospecting plan for potential customers and work closely with the  Branch Manager to capture new business opportunities and meet revenue  targets. ??Conduct research to understand the nature of business development effort  required, customer expectations etc. to inform customer acquisition strategies  for the branch. MUTHOOT   FINCORP   |   BUSINESS   DEVELOPMENT   EXECUTIVE  Page 2 of 4   ??Actively participate in brand awareness campaigns and branch level marketing programs, outreach, and events. ??Maintain data and records related to sales, marketing or business development and keep database of prospective customers updated.  Compliance ??Uphold Muthoot FinCorps vision & values, ensure high ethical standards and  adherence to Manual of Instructions, regulatory and statutory guidelines, and  maintenance of records, assets, statutory registers, etc. ??Ensure prompt intimation and escalation of incidents/fraudulent activities. KEY   CHALLENGES ??Convincing customers to opt for Muthoot FinCorps products or services, building trust and reputation amidst stiff competition, negative perceptions, or lack of brand awareness. ??Competition from banks and other players offering similar products or services at a lower rate of interest. ??Resource and budgetary constraints to develop or implement new business development initiatives. column2: Role: School Development Officer. Location: Vibgyor Rise at Indore. Department: Sales. Band will be M2.  Reporting will be to the Principal and parallelly to the cluster manager marketing and Sr. Manager Sales. Primary Purpose :    Overall, in-charge of the Relationship Cell for the operational Centre. Serve as a link between the organization and the parent/s (existing and potential) ensuring excellent parent service and satisfaction.   Primary Responsibilities: Parent relationship management:  Effectively maintain and develop parent-organization relationships by providing appropriate solutions to all parent enquiries across mediums. (in-person, over the phone, email, company website etc.) Oversee the resolution of all the parent queries which are outside the purview of the RE cell and be a point of escalation/support where necessary. Ensure all complaints are registered in PS Tracker and oversee the resolution of complaints for meeting TAT.  Periodically review the past parent queries repository/CRM and innovate to develop nifty solutions towards prompt resolutions.  Seek post query resolution feedback (over the phone) and improvise, thereby creating a parent delight and positive brand image.  Ensure the front desk /relationship desk is staffed to ensure no parent is left unattended during operational hours.  Manage the setup of the front office area accentuating the organization brand; placement of posters/standees etc. with assistance from the admin department. Be cognizant of the latest achievements of the organization/center and cascade it as a part of parent interactions / sales conversations.  Efficiently guide the parent on school systems and process and ensure that the repository of updated information is available at all point in time Keep track of all organization advertising manual / brochures/admission kits and ensure effective information flow. Adroitly handle irate parents and ensure that each parent interface ends at parent delight as far as possible  Efficiently make use of all aids available i.e., Hand-outs, Audio visual support to educate the parents on the USPs of the organization and child education pedagogy followed.    Facilitate the information of all elements pertaining to a child's school life cycle, post-school activities, summer camps, etc.    Sales and Marketing:  Ensure active involvement in the complete sales cycle; lead the RE team to meet its sales and revenue goals.  Enhance Parent experience through School Tour, Discovery Room etc. and Parent Engagements  Devise plans to achieve the sales goals and create strategies to meet the annual center targets. Adroitly oversee the entire sales process and interject; where necessary for all potential parents from first interface to closure, thus positively augmenting the conversions from enquiry to admissions.  Be abreast of the competition school offerings and prevalent market practices  Introduce and work upon Pre-School and Corporate Tie-Ups and support the teams by providing leads and helping with faster closures. Initiate and participate in RWA events, parent seminars and other marketing Initiatives to create brand awareness and promote the USPs like Summer Camps, Day Care, PSA activities etc.   Administrative Responsibilities:  :   Manage admission   registration manually and on ERP as per the Process guidelines and generate   MIS. Scrutinize and   maintain records for all admission forms and documents Ensure each LC is personally attended to,   and best efforts are taken to retain. Ensuring   effective and timely parent grievance resolution Ensuring a   benchmarked PSAT score for the school Ensuring timely   collection of fees. Adhere to agreed   monthly marketing + existing parent engagement plans. Ensuring zero   percent deviation from agreed audit guidelines and other systems and   processes  Ensuring timely   and complete documentation   Secondary Responsibilities:  People Management and Up-skilling:  Should Efficient plan and organize the day to ensure all opportunities are maximized Must effectively manage the RE cell team; coach, inspire and provide actionable and constructive feedback, provide on-the- job training to improve team performance Should train the RE cell team on the new USPs being introduced in the organization  Should motivate and inspire the teams to perform better. Business Acumen Enhancement:  Updated of the past sales trends and records. Must be aware of the latest news in the education industry make use wherever found necessary towards team knowledge enhancement  Must have a detailed understanding of school Manual work to staff, children etc. Should participate in training workshops on Sales and Marketing to be updated on the latest trends   Work Relations:  Internal: Report to the Principal on all administrative issues. Interface with all departments for support/ any other operational issue/s External: Interface with potential and existing parents Interface with external vendors towards any marketing initiative execution    Skills and Knowledge:    The candidate must possess knowledge about ERP and admission data and filing. I should have excellent communication skills and telephone etiquette. I should have academic and marketing knowledge with a great salesmanship personality. Should have proficient knowledge of school events and activities in depth. Should follow the policies and procedures of the organization.   Proficiency Grid:     ERP and Admission Data and Filing Should be Proficient. Communication   Skills and Telephone Etiquette should be Proficient   Administrative and   Managerial should be Proficient   Should be proficient in training the team. Proficient in the Marketing & Proficient in the Academic Knowledge Should be Proficient Orator in terms of distinguished for skill and power as speaker.  Should be Proficient in the organisational Policies and   Procedures Proficient in the Salesmanship Should be having Proficient personality. Should have in depth knowledge of events and school activities.

column2: As a Sales analyst in Sales Operations, you are in a role that is essential to the success of the SFDC CRM application. You will deliver outstanding support services to NetApp Sales users and partner community spread across the globe. You will need to work closely with cross-functional teams which includes Sales, Marketing, IT, Sales Operations, Order Management & Enterprise reporting and Master data management team. This position requires problem solving skills, analytical skills, identifying and uncovering change requirements, do User Acceptance Testing of new features and bug fixes. This is a challenging and exciting position with an opportunity to directly impact the effectiveness and success of the sales organization. Essential Functions: Provide outstanding daily operational support for CRM system, which includes lead management, contact management, user management, account management, opportunity management, forecasting, admin/configuration changes for both direct (field) and indirect (channel) sales force. Perform problem analysis and get to the root cause of user reported issue. Comprehension and capability of meeting Quality and Service Level Agreements (SLAs) Proactively improve the sales user experience and make sales tools a competitive advantage, identify/recommend and implement process improvements to ensure a positive customer experience. Perform data quality management - Data analysis, Quality checks and ad-hoc reporting. Analyze and report support metrics. Learn and understand Enterprise systems and how they are integrated, including Customer Relationship Management (CRM), Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP), Systems/Applications/Products in Data Processing, Customer Master data and Enterprise Business Intelligence which are essential to this role. User Acceptance Testing (UAT) of features and bug fixes for major releases and maintenance releases Engage business program managers and technical resources when necessary. Job Requirements Experience with salesforce.com administration - Security/visibility model, User administration etc. (Minimum of 2 years). Good understanding of sales processes and sales systems. Excellent interpersonal and customer relations skills demonstrated through strong presentation, verbal and written communication. Good understanding of IT and marketing processes and their objectives, as related to sales and Sales support, Creative approach to problem solving. Must be flexible to work in 24/5 model - APAC, EMEA and US business and work in shift as assigned by the lead/manager. Be a proactive contributor and subject matter expert on projects. Excellent English language; including verbal, written and comprehension skills. Education Bachelors Degree Required Minimum of two years of experience with Customer Relationship Management (CRM) Tool Required Minimum of two years enterprise experience in Sales Processes/Incident (Case) Management Preferred Work experience as Admin in CRM application (Salesforce.com) Required

column2: Q job Title: Sales Operations Analyst - Financial Software   Unit   Location:  Navi Mumbai, India  Overview:  We are seeking a skilled and experienced Sales Operations Analyst to join our team in Mumbai. As a Sales Operations Analyst specializing in financial software  industry , you will play a critical role in supporting our sales team by providing insightful analysis, generating reports, and optimizing sales processes. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in finance/accounting, extensive experience in sales operations, and proficiency in CRM automation tools and dashboard generation.  Key Responsibilities:   Periodic and Ad-hoc Sales Reporting:   Generate and distribute periodic sales reports to stakeholders, providing insights into sales performance, trends, and forecasts.  Create ad-hoc reports as requested by sales leadership, incorporating relevant data to support decision-making.  Generate reports for the marketing team related to campaign, inbound/outbound leads, account-based and pipeline related activities.  Forecast Reporting:   Collaborate with sales and finance teams to develop accurate sales forecasts.  Present/Share weekly forecast dashboard to different stakeholders (business unit, finance, sales)  Prepare and present forecast summary per business unit during the monthly budget review.?  Incentive & Commission Calculation:   Design and execute incentive and commission structures for the sales team, ensuring alignment with company goals and objectives.  Compute sales credits accurately and efficiently, considering various performance metrics.  Send communication around incentives and commission plans.  Provide monthly payout to manage team broken down per business unit, sales, and region.?  CRM Automation:   Lead the development of dashboard and reports based on CRM information (currently Zoho)  Lead the implementation and optimization of CRM automation tools to streamline sales processes, enhance data accuracy, and improve overall efficiency.  Provide training and support to sales team members on CRM usage and best practices.  Work closely with the finance team to lead the CRM automation with the finance/accounting tool (SAP).?    qualifications:   Bachelor's degree in Finance, Accounting,  Engineering   , Business Administration, or related field  with strong numerical aptitude and business acumen . MBA or equivalent preferred.  5+ years of experience in a similar role within the financial software industry.  Strong understanding of sales operations processes, including sales reporting, forecasting, and incentive management.  Proficiency in CRM systems (e.g., Zoho, Salesforce, Dynamics) and advanced proficiency in Microsoft Excel or other data analysis tools.  Excellent analytical skills with the ability to interpret complex data and draw actionable insights.  Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively across teams.

column2: Job description Job Title:  Operations Executive - Coordinator Location:  Nariman Point, Mumbai Immediate Joiner Required Minimum Work Experience :  At least 6 years of experience minimum in operations, administrative support, or a closely related role with an emphasis on sales coordination. Best ways to apply for this position:   WhatsApp:  The quickest way to apply is to WhatsApp your resume directly to us. Please send your detailed resume to  +91-9930092737  along with a brief message introducing yourself. Job Summary: Join our dynamic team as a Operations Coordinator where you will play a crucial role in supporting our sales operations in Mumbai. This position is ideal for someone who thrives in a fast-paced environment and possesses a keen ability to multitask and prioritize. The Sales Coordinator will work closely with the Sales Head to streamline daily activities and enhance the efficiency of the sales department. Key Responsibilities: Sales Support:  Actively manage and coordinating sales operations. Help organize and maintain sales schedules, ensuring that all daily activities are listed and accounted for in an orderly fashion. Administrative Excellence:  Utilize your advanced skills in  Microsoft Office  for a variety of tasks including sophisticated document preparation and professional letter writing. Data Management:  Show your proficiency in mathematical concepts by managing and analyzing sales data with accuracy. Use tools like  Tally  for financial data processing and Excel for data manipulation, including proficiency in V-lookup to extract necessary information efficiently. Communication:  Demonstrate excellent verbal and written communication skills in both English and Marathi, essential for effectively interacting with team members and clients. Confidentiality:  Uphold the highest standards of confidentiality, responsibly handling sensitive information regarding the company and its operations without compromise. Qualifications: Proven experience as a Sales Coordinator or in a similar role. Strong mathematical abilities and experience in data analysis. Proficient in MS Office, with exceptional skills in Excel and Tally. Excellent communication skills in English and Marathi. Ability to maintain high levels of confidentiality. Required Skill Set: Administrative Proficiency:  Advanced capability in using Microsoft Office applications, including but not limited to comprehensive letter writing and document management. Mathematical Acumen:  Strong ability in mathematics, crucial for managing and analyzing sales data accurately and efficiently. Technical Skills:  Proficiency in financial and data management tools such as Tally and Microsoft Excel. Expertise in Excel functions, specifically V-lookup, is essential for efficient data extraction and manipulation. Communication Skills:  Excellent verbal and written communication abilities in both English and Marathi, necessary for effective coordination within the team and with clients. Confidentiality:  A solid track record of handling sensitive information with the utmost discretion and integrity. Personal Attributes: - Highly presentable with a professional demeanor. - Excellent interpersonal skills and a collaborative team player. - Driven and detail-oriented. - Capable of managing stress and meeting tight deadlines.

Responsibilities and Duties: 1. Achievement of the set targets for the Eccetras Psychometric tests and counselling sessions. 2. Meet administration managers / principals of educational institutions and introduce the programs and tests. 3. Conduct promotional sessions and presentations for private Schools and Universities to increase program awareness 4. Provide feedback on a regular basis to the Management and suggest sales strategies. 5. Coordinate with technical team for feedback from students. 6. Support the marketing team in Content preparation for program promotions. Qualification and Experience: Graduate preferably with Psychology back ground although not mandatory. Having 1-2 years  experience with an Educational Institution or University is desirable/fresher can also Apply for this job position. He/she must have a flair for sales and must be a go getter. Skills 1. Selling and Negotiation skills 2. Excellent listening skills and empathy 3. Good Presentation and Communication skills 4. Spoken and Written proficiency in English and Malayalam 5. Interpersonal skills and coordination abilities   Interested candidates should be Copy paste below Link and fill the Application Forum: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1cjb5qzK-aHoRbTwWEFeE_ZwxXcfS0KQ42A8LB2fvnnE/edit Job Post      Eccetra is a Kochi based innovative career counselling and guidance centre. Eccetra aims in analysing individuals through specially curated psychometric tests that generate precise reports on personality, aptitude, abilities and other psychological traits. We are looking for Sales Executives in Kochi, Kozhikode and Trivandrum. The ideal candidate would be a graduate or post graduate, with a 1 to 2 years experience preferably in education industry and  fresher can also apply for this position. He/ She would be responsible for achieving the set targets for the Career tests and counselling sessions. A go getter with a flair for sales would fit the position. Good Communication, Presentation skills and Convincing ability is a must. The right candidate can expect an industry matching salary package and opportunity to earn lucrative incentives. We transform lives....we make a difference.

column2: Role & responsibilities     As a member of the LearnTech team, you will work closely with the marketing and sales department of a leading two-wheeler manufacturer in India. The role will have the following responsibilities: - 100% capturing of walk-in enquiry - understand best practices and Horizontal deployment of the same in the rest of the dealerships allocated to the candidate within the city - Monitoring dealer by dealer on enquiry capturing and collaborating to improve the same  - Enable exit customer meeting with Dealer Sales Manager to understand Dealer Sales Executive capability concerning sales process adherence The opportunity also presents a chance to get absorbed in field-based roles for one of the largest two-wheeler players in the country.  The role is based in Ahmedabad, Noida, and Kolkata. The candidate must be based in either of these cities or willing to relocate to any of these cities. This role involves extensive travel within your city of operation. column2: We are seeking a motivated and detail-oriented Sales Coordinator to join our dynamic sales team. The Sales Coordinator will play a key role in supporting our sales representatives and ensuring smooth operations within the sales department. This position offers an exciting opportunity to contribute to the success of our sales initiatives and provide excellent customer service to our clients. Key Responsibilities: Assist sales team with order processing, including entering sales orders, generating quotes, and managing purchase orders. Coordinate communication between sales representatives, customers, and other internal departments to ensure timely delivery of products and services. Maintain accurate records of sales transactions and updated customer information in the CRM system. Prepare sales reports and analysis for management review, including sales performance metrics and forecasts. Provide administrative support to the sales team, including scheduling meetings, managing calendars, and preparing presentations. Assist in organizing and coordinating sales events, trade shows, and promotional activities. Respond promptly to customer inquiries and resolve issues or concerns in a professional and courteous manner. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify opportunities for process improvements and efficiency gains. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or related field preferred. Proven experience in a sales support or coordination role, preferably in the technology industry. Strong organizational skills with the ability to manage multiple tasks simultaneously and prioritize effectively. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with a customer-focused approach. Proficiency in Microsoft Office suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint) and CRM software. Attention to detail and a high level of accuracy in data entry and record-keeping. Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment. Positive attitude, willingness to learn, and adaptability to changing priorities. Why Join Us: Competitive salary and benefits package. Opportunity to work with cutting-edge technology and innovative products. Collaborative and supportive work environment. Career growth and development opportunities within a growing company. Make a meaningful impact by contributing to the success of our sales team and driving business growth.

column2: **Job Summary:** We are seeking a skilled and detail-oriented Real Estate Property Surveyor to play a vital role in our real estate operations. The ideal candidate will be responsible for conducting property surveys, assessing land and property conditions, and providing accurate reports and data to support real estate transactions and development projects. **Key Responsibilities:** 1. **Property Surveys:** - Conduct comprehensive property surveys to determine boundaries, land topography, and existing structures. - Use surveying instruments and technology to measure and map property features accurately. - Record precise measurements, property lines, and relevant details. 2. **Data Collection and Analysis:** - Collect data related to property dimensions, elevations, and improvements. - Analyze survey data to create detailed maps, plans, and reports for use in real estate transactions and development projects. - Identify any encroachments, easements, or zoning restrictions affecting the property. 3. **Legal Compliance:** - Ensure that property surveys comply with all local, state, and federal regulations and property laws. - Assist in resolving property boundary disputes and legal issues through accurate surveys and documentation. 4. **Client Communication:** - Collaborate with real estate agents, property developers, and legal professionals to provide surveying expertise and support during property transactions. - Communicate survey findings and implications to clients and stakeholders. 5. **Field Work:** - Conduct field inspections and site visits to verify property conditions and survey accuracy. - Ensure safety protocols are followed during fieldwork. **Qualifications:** - Proven experience as a real estate property surveyor. - Strong knowledge of land surveying principles. - Excellent attention to detail and accuracy in measurements and documentation. - Ability to work independently and as part of a team. Kindly Call directly to HR - 9821880368 Email ID - hr@jaygee.co.in

column2: As a Commercial Property Specialist, you will play a pivotal role in the real estate industry, specializing in commercial properties      Your responsibilities will involve working with clients, property owners, and tenants to facilitate the purchase, sale, or leasing of commercial real estate assets              Responsibilities:            Property Evaluation:    Conduct thorough assessments and valuations of commercial properties, considering factors such as location, market trends, and property condition.            Marketing and Sales:    Develop and implement effective marketing strategies to attract potential buyers or tenants. Actively participate in sales and leasing activities to secure transactions.            Client Engagement:    Build and maintain strong relationships with clients, understanding their specific property needs and providing tailored solutions.            Negotiation:    Skillfully negotiate terms and conditions of commercial property transactions to ensure favorable outcomes for your clients.            Market Research:    Stay updated with market trends, competition, and investment opportunities within the commercial real estate sector.            Customer Service:    Deliver exceptional customer service by addressing client inquiries, concerns, and providing expert advice throughout the real estate transaction process.            Networking:    Establish and maintain a strong network of industry contacts, including property developers, real estate agents, legal professionals, and financial institutions.            Documentation:    Ensure accurate and timely completion of all legal and financial documentation related to property transactions.            Time Management:    Effectively manage your time to handle multiple client interactions, property viewings, and administrative tasks efficiently.            Problem-Solving:    Quickly resolve any issues or obstacles that may arise during property transactions, ensuring a smooth and satisfactory experience for all parties involved. column2: As a Business Support Executive, your role is to provide administrative and operational support to ensure the smooth functioning of business operations     You will assist in various tasks that contribute to the efficiency and effectiveness of the organization     Administrative Support: Provide administrative assistance to executives or teams within the organization     This may include managing calendars, scheduling meetings, preparing documents, and handling correspondence     Data Management: Maintain and update databases, spreadsheets, and other business records     Organize and manage data to ensure accuracy and accessibility for decision-making and reporting purposes     Documentation and Reporting: Prepare and maintain business-related documents, reports, and presentations     Assist in generating reports, analyzing data, and preparing summaries for management review     Communication and Correspondence: Handle internal and external communication, including emails, phone calls, and written correspondence     Liaise with clients, customers, and other stakeholders to address inquiries, provide information, and resolve issues     Project Coordination: Assist in coordinating and monitoring project activities     Track project timelines, deliverables, and milestones     Collaborate with team members to ensure projects are progressing according to plan     Process Improvement: Identify opportunities for process improvement and efficiency enhancement     Collaborate with relevant teams to implement improvements, streamline workflows, and optimize business processes     Event Planning and Coordination: Assist in organizing and coordinating company events, conferences, or meetings     This may include venue selection, logistics arrangement, coordination with vendors, and attendee management     Financial Support: Provide support in financial activities, such as expense tracking, invoice processing, and budget monitoring     Assist in preparing financial reports or statements as required     Relationship Management: Maintain positive relationships with clients, vendors, and other external stakeholders     Ensure prompt and professional communication, address queries, and provide assistance when needed     Cross-Functional Collaboration: Collaborate with different departments or teams within the organization to support cross-functional projects or initiatives     Foster a collaborative and supportive work environment         Requirements         Bachelor's degree in business administration, management, or a related field (preferred)     Proven experience in a similar role providing administrative or operational support     Excellent organizational and time management skills to handle multiple tasks and prioritize effectively     Strong attention to detail and accuracy in data management and documentation     Proficiency in using office productivity tools such as Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint)     Excellent written and verbal communication skills     Ability to work independently and collaborate effectively in a team environment     Strong problem-solving and critical-thinking skills     Adaptability and flexibility to handle changing priorities and work in a fast-paced environment     Professionalism and discretion in handling sensitive information     Knowledge of basic financial principles and experience with financial tasks (eg, expense tracking, budget monitoring) is a plus
